name: J R
text: Took my truck here in Oct of 2020 and they forgot to reconnect the sway bar up front, which I fixed. Then gave them a second chance with my wife's car and just discovered they only replaced 3 of the 5 lug bolts on one wheel. Now I have to buy new lug bolts. Go somewhere else if you want the job done correctly.

resp.text: Our apologies that we did not meet your expectations, not what we want to have happen! I see that we have already opened a customer service ticket, we will be back in touch soon!

name: Amanda
text:
As a woman I can say that I have never had a good experience in places when getting my car serviced.  I am spoken down to, given hidden charges, and just treated with general disrespect.
But this was absolutely not the case coming here. Ricky was incredibly nice and spoke to me like an actual human being. I told him what I needed and what time I needed it done. Not only was it done in the exact time I needed, he called to verify what we discussed and verify the price. He did not try to sell my anything unnecessary. And the price wasn't a penny over what he told me. It was an amazing experience and it will be the only place I get my car serviced for the foreseeable future. Thank you for your respect and impeccable service.

resp.text: Thanks for the stars, Amanda! Glad the team was able to take such great care of you. Take care!

name: Kevin Stephens
text: This review is more for an employee than the store itself. Not to take away from the store, though, the store is great. Tire Tech, Ricky, deserves a large amount of praise. That gentleman works his behind off. Every time I’m in the store, he’s there. Working hard. He’s got a fantastic attitude and a general willingness to help. If someone from Tire Discounters sees this, give that man a raise.

resp.text: Awww, thank you for the 5-star review and the kind comments Ricky. We are so glad you had a great experience Kevin, we do what we do for customers just like you. Please come back and see us again when you need us and stay safe out there!

name: Claire Tomlin
text:
Fantastic service! They helped me with my tire issue and Ima go back to them for all my tire needs!

Pros: Honest and down to earth; easy to talk to!

Cons: a bit standoffish at first but it may have been the weather (Torrential downpour)

resp.text: That’s how we rock so you can roll Claire! Thank you for the feedback and 5-star review! We work hard to provide you with a great experience. Please come back to see us again when you need us. Stay safe out there!

name: William Swinson
text: Joseph the manager and his staff have been phenomenal. Great prices and the service is simply outstanding. He and his team helped me solve a major problem that 2020+ Ram 1500 have major complaints about due to tire shimmy at certain speeds. They fixed the entire problem by performing a “dynamic balancing” splitting the needed weights and road force validation. So these folks saved me from a problem that most folks can’t figure out. Truck runs smooth as silk now and these guys were a pleasure to work with. I will NEVER NEVER take my vehicles anywhere else. You guys just made me a customer for life. Just so you know, I make a living teaching organizations how to be efficient and “customer-centric” and these guys rock !!!! Thanks guys!!!!! Ed

resp.text: That’s how we roll, William! Glad we were able to take such good care of you. Thanks, and we’ll see you again down the road!

text: For the last 5 years I’ve been taking my Camry to NTB in Huntsville and they were fine until they started trying to up sell me on stuff I didn’t need and their prices kept going up with the staff becoming less and less friendly too. When Tire Discounters opened up on Winchester road I looked forward to trying them out since they are much closer and after having some work done on my other vehicles I knew this would be the right place to get a fresh set of tires. They had a great sale going on for Pirelli’s and they are driving great, hopefully they maintain their friendly service and good prices because this is where I’ll be going for the life of my new tires.

resp.text: We rock so you can roll! We're the authority in customer service and auto safety, Ryan. See ya in 5000 miles for your 1st of many free lifetime tire care visits. We want to take make sure we take good care of those new puppies.

text: Awesome service! The staff is very  quick, attentive and professional. They patched my SUV for FREE and cleaned the wheels. We were just about to head out for a road trip so this was great. I'll definitely be coming back when those tires need to be replaced.

resp.text: Rockin' and rollin'! Glad we could keep ya rollin' safely, Dan. Hope you enjoyed your trip and we'll see ya again when ya need us.

name: Stefanie Terrell
text: Do not take your vehicle here unless you’d like something coincidentally to happen requiring an additional repair. My husband took his vehicle here for a tire patch which resulted in him being told he needed new tires due to uneven wear. He received a quote and agreed to pursue the new tire service. During service, he was told that his alignment was extremely off; although he had taken his vehicle to the dealership for routine maintenance. They drove his vehicle to our house (courtesy drop-off) and didn’t even mention that the vehicle was making a grinding noise when accelerating and slowing down (4WD issue). Deceitful and dishonest. Their management told my husband that this was a coincidence and a known issue with the make and model of his vehicle. Then proceeded to give him a quote to repair. BUYER BEWARE

resp.text: We have strict policies in place to never oversell unnecessary items and follow MAP guidelines when making any product or service recommendations. We would like to connect you with a TD Rep to learn more and address your concerns, Stefanie. Would you mind sending your preferred contact information to tirediscounters.com/contact? We look forward to connecting.

text:
We Saturday at 4:59pm ( yes it was closing time on a Saturday night) we called over to this place, explained to them what was going on we limped to their parking lot we were told they did not have the tire and that they were closed. Just as we were pulling in Mike, the manager was coming out of the garage (while calling other locations to see if they had the tire size we needed) to let us know what he had already done in 60 seconds!!!! After getting Mike the correct tire size, that he had in stock, he was pulling us in to get the old tire off and new tire on. Scott kept us company and checked us out! These guys were able to get us in and out and back on the road quickly! Despite it being closing time on a Saturday night Mike and Scott were there to provide outstanding customer service, quick action and a can do attitude!  Thank you guys again for everything!

Johnny Lavalais

name: Sean Copenhaver
text:
So there I was, just dropped the kids off at school with minutes to spare, running a little behind on my way into work, and with my tire low on air the entire time! It truly felt like a Monday indeed. The caution light erupts to life on my dashboard nearly blinding me, my rear driver side tire...is low on air. *Que dramatic music*
I pull into the nearest mechanic shop and park right in front of the first available bay. They were all open and currently being mopped by the staff. Before I have a chance to throw the car in park, there is a young man walking my way. With the car now in park, I step out of the car and he greets me with a warm smile and a "Good Morning to ya, what can we help with?", but before I have a chance to open my mouth he whistles in shock at the sight of my tire. When I turn around to see the damage, there it is, staring me in the face like a angry mother-in-law when you make an inappropriate joke at the dinner table, a screw.
Now there's two men attending to my car. Courtney, the first-responder, and Lamar, the muscle. The elect to change out the tire and find what they have in stock. 2 good conversation and half a cup of cheap coffee later I've got keys in my hand and ready to start my day. I made it to work on time too for anyone who was wondering.

resp.text: We are so appreciative for you sharing your story. These guys really do work hard to try to be a positive impact in people's lives. Some may say, "you guys just change oil." but we like to say, "we're not just changing oil, we're changing lives!" we strive to be the best 10 minutes in a customers day. thank you for your business and we are so grateful again for your kind words.

name: Ernest G Waters
text: Update to previous review.  Since my initial visit to the McGee rd service facility back in December,  which did an excellent job, I have had 2 bad experiences.  1st bad experience was with my wife's car. She had the oil changed at the eastern blvd facility.  Approximately 1 week later her car's check engine light came on and the fault was for dirty oil. She had the oil checked at a local change facility and it was a quart low. They did another oil change, and I have the filter from that change and it is not as clean a filter as you think from 1 week previous. I had also gotten my oil changed in my truck a few days after she did at the eastern Blvd facility.  So I decided to take a look at my oil and filter. The filter on my truck had an install date written on it from the McGee Rd facility of 12/9/19. The date I first got Express to change it. They supposedly changed my oil and filter on 2/7/20 at McGee rd. I will also attach a pic of the filter . Needless to say this is a very bad way to run a business.  Engine damage from dirty oil is very significant possibility from these action.

resp.text: Hi there, Ernest. While we never like for a customer to leave unsatisfied, feedback like this helps us grow as a company. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We value your business and would love to address your concerns as quickly as possible. When you have time, please leave us your contact information as well as the details you provided here at https://www.expressoil.com/contact/ so we can work to resolve your issue. Thank you!

text:
DO NOT GET AN OIL CHANGE HERE!! IVE HAD 2 CARS THAT ENDED UP WITH A LOCKED MOTOR, A WEEK OR SO AFTER AN OIL CHANGE AT THIS LOCATION BC THE PPL HERE FORGET TO PUT THE OIL CAP BACK ON...  THEYLL TELL YOU EVERYTHING IS FINE AND SEND YOU ON YOUR WAY, WITHOUT AN OIL CAP... YES, THE SAME THING HAS HAPPENED TO ME TWICE, WITH TWO DIFFERENT VEHICLES ON TWO DIFFERENT OCCASIONS.. AVOID THIS LOCATION AT ALL COSTS..

I see they replied to my comment, LYING... SAYING THAT THEY HAVE NEVER SERVICED MY VEHICLES BUT I ASSURE YOU THEY DID... After the 2nd time it happened,  I called and they confirmed that I had an oil change at THEIR LOCATION but assured me it wasn't their fault... name: rtc
text:
Went in for new shocks and coils, they installed them well, but when I started driving, my vehicle constantly pulled to the left. If I didn't hold the steering wheel tight it would have flipped at high speeds. So I called them and they swore they had done an alignment. I asked if they'd check again to make sure it was done right and they begrudgingly said yes. Took it back in, they said everything looked great. I drove it off the lot and there was still a severe pull to the left. They blamed my tires and said it's because they had a bad wear pattern. (My tires were only a few months old).

So I took it to another place on the other side of the river. They did an alignment and told me that whoever had done my previous alignment lied to me. They showed me on a print out how the camber was over an inch out of line and how the toe of one wheel was turned too far in. I drove off the lot and my vehicle drove as straight as an arrow.

Bacon Alignment lied to me twice and charged me for something they didn't do. Avoid.

name: Josh Brewer
text: This is the best shop around, I am fairly new to Off-roading and building a vehicle to do it in. Josh, Devin, and Paul have all been extremely helpful and informative. Josh helped figure out what suspension I needed for the future of my build and helped explain the pros and cons and what fits my needs and price ranges. Devon helped out anytime I called to follow up on when parts where coming in along with the progress during the day of install. Paul man this guy is the one you want looking over labor, he is very OCD about getting it right and not cutting corners and has a wealth of knowledge. Additionally all the staff at Elite are very professional and will answer any question you have, if they can’t answer it then they will make sure they get you the answer with some digging. I will maintain being a happy customer with a trusted shop which is hard to find. I can’t wait to do future building with the Elite family! Oh by the way check out all their social media and advertisements they are top notch!

text: These guys are very transparent and polite. The turn around time was quicker than anticipated. Most importantly, they’re honest and do excellent work. I will not hesitate to use them in the future for vehicle needs and wants.

name: Grant Johnson
text:
Recently bought a new to me Jeep TJ. I couldn’t even drive it home (15 mins away from place of purchase) due to death wobble, loose steering wore out track bar and a laundry list of other issues. I had little to no hope for getting the vehicle street worthy and planned on just keeping it as a dedicated trailer rig. I called Elite and spoke with Josh over the phone, he said they can get it fixed up and back on the road.

They absolutely blew my expectations with the work put in on my jeep. They replaced all heim joints on the steering and track bar as well as completed a full inspection on the vehicle torque checking all nuts and bolts under the vehicle my peace of mind. They even found a few more issues that were fixed in shop for safety reasons on this inspection.

The whole process was seamless from drop off to pickup. Communication was top notch on any issue they ran into along the way. I will absolutely be returning to get my truck leveled with wheels and tires in the near future. Awesome job and awesome company. ⭐️ 12/10stars ⭐️

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review Grant glad we could get your Jeep back drivable!

resp.text: Thank you Allen we look forward to working with you more!

text: Highly recommend!!!  Incredible job done by Elite and their professional and knowledgeable staff. Brought my 2020 TRD Pro up to speed with a 2/1 lift and some 285/70/17 Nitto Ridge Grapplers. Great work done by a great team.  Elite now has my TRD Pro looking like it always should have.

resp.text: Glad we could help you make it happen!

name: M O
text: Rip off.. took my Yukon in for an alignment they called and said it was ready. Then told me 119bucks payed they handed me my keys then said oh BTW we couldn't do the alignment it needed new tie rod end inners and ball joints. And said the amount I payed was for the inspection.. I didn't want an inspection but a alignment. So I took the yukon home and replaced all the parts to find out it was fine. Only had alittle play in upper right ball joint the mechanic is a joke only trying to fill his pockets this is why you can't trust auto shops.  Stay away because you are gonna get ripped off!!.  I Am Mike Overton and I Approve This Message!!!

resp.text:
Hey Mike Overton we are sorry you feel this way but we did not perform an alignment due to worn out suspension and steering components. You getting charged was a mistake by your sales person which was corrected and you were given a refund. We pride ourselves in quality work we do not change for a service we cannot perform any other shop would have performed an “Alignment” and not let you know about any front end issues and charged you.

Thanks,
Josh Balch

text: Josh and the crew did great work on my Jeep installing some items I needed to get a better ride. Also had a emergency front drive shaft problem and they was able to put the part on the same day and had it in stock. Great group of people

text: The guys at Elite went above and beyond helping me get my Gladiator sorted.  It's like all the best guys at different shops decided to go in together and open  the "Elite" shop for off-roading.  They had the best prices, got the work done ahead of schedule and got it done right the very first time.  Extremely helpful and very attentive to what I wanted.  Solid advice, never tried to up sell, and was fast to respond.  Great communication even before I let them know I was going to use them.  Solid group of guys.  I have dealt with a few of the more popular off road shops in town and this was by far my best experience

resp.text: Thank you for the review Shaun we look forward to working with you more!

text: Josh, Patrick, Alex, and the rest of the crew here do excellent work. From basic to total custom fab. Check them out if you get in the area or online. Prices are great and fair. Local shop, not big box chain that makes you just a number in the cash register.

Thanks guys

text: Great guys there! They really helped me decide what suspension I needed to go with to suite my needs. I have since been there multiple times to keep the build going. Their service department is second to none. They will sit and explain all specifications of your build to you. I highly recommend them and send all my friends and family to them for any of their automotive needs.

name: Stephen King
text: They We’re very professional. I dropped my jeep off and within minutes they had it a lift and showed me all of my options. They weren’t high pressure like most of the shops I visited. We went over several options, and I chose the one best for my budget. They were by far the most affordable. I checked all the 4x4 shops in the Birmingham areas and they saved me 20% minimum. I would highly recommend Elite Off-road and Performance. They are miles above the competition!

text: Very happy with my build.Josh does great work.My Jeep is a 93 YJ.Josh installed new tires and wheels and a 4 inch suspension lift.Upgraded my steering.new rear drive line and new rear axles. He and his guys have done a great job.

text: I called about getting an oil leak fixed thought it was 1 issue (expensive) turns out it was something not as bad. along with that they gave my jeep a full check over and found some other issues I was semi aware of but was hesitant to fix in the past. we got that taken care of as well.  All in all I would recommend this shop and its staff everytime. great customer service and amazing turnaround. I had other shops tell me up to 14 days. they had it done in 3.

name: Martha Allred
text: Thank you Josh and the guys at Elite offroad! My husband couldn't be happier with his new brush guard and running boards. Elite Offroad is very knowledgeable and helpful. I highly recommend Elite offroad to anyone I know!

name: Kyle Spena
text: DO NOT DO BUISNESS WITH THESE GUYS! They worked on my car, was there to be gone over, checked over and to fix the leaks, as well as new plugs, new rear end gear, and to address an electrical issue. The car was deilevered to me, and It leaks oil, transmission fluid, rear end fluid, and gas.. the car wont run longer then 5 min or a couple miles without drawing the battery down and dieing.. these guys charged $2,914.90 to fix my car and had it over 4 months..and came out worse then when it went in.. and of course Josh (the owner) doesn't want to stand behind his work, or pay to have it fixed correctly! This guy scammed almost $3,000 is what it boils down to, and had my car over 4 months with every excuse in the world as to why it wasn't done yet.. I do NOT recommend using this place, they are a JOKE!

name: Jeremy Christian
text: Chelsea Wrecker needed some tires mounted on our wrecker and we needed someone to be able to do the job fast and local they met both requirements and went above and beyond to get tow truck back on the road.... the guys are excellent

name: Ken Osvath
text:
Highly recommend.  Thanks once again to Elite Offroad And Performance!  We’ve had great experiences working with Josh and Alex.

Previously EOP had stayed late waiting for a towed Jeep arrival when our son’s track bar mount broke, rendering it un-drivable.

They fixed it in a timely and cost-effective manner, installing a new adjustable track bar and Teraflex front lower adjustable control arms which significantly improved drive quality.

Then recently I swung by and picked up a HIKEit X9 Throttle Controller for my Jeep, from Alex, as a cost-effective performance upgrade.

OMG!  What a difference!   Just as EOP advertised — it’s easy of use, adjustable Throttle Response with 36 settings within its 4-driving modes (Cruise, Sport, Race, Eco/4x4 Crawl) and Auto mode that adjusts dynamically to your driving along with Anti-Theft Password Protected Pedal Lock.   Thanks EOP!

name: Kevin Ingram
text: The guys at Elite Offroad and performance really go the extra mile . I enjoyed meeting them, and i would recommend them for all your offroad needs. Josh and Paul are some really good guys. Glad i got to meet them

text: I have used this location twice. I am beyond happy with both trips here. Brian and Dustin were very helpful, professional and their service allowed me to not wait there long. They have my business and will be a returning customer. Thank you!

resp.text: Hi, Ashley, thanks for the awesome feedback! Our team here at Express Oil Change & Tire Engineers is always happy to service your vehicle, and we’re thrilled to hear these words about the knowledge of our staff! We look forward to seeing you whenever you need us!

name: Kendra Sparks
text: Super grateful for this business and Brian. Our family was traveling home from Florida and our back tire went out 4 hours into our 14 hour drive, we went to Walmart first and they didn’t have our tire size, and we called down to Express Oil Change and they told us to bring our car down And at the very least would get our spare on so we could get somewhere that had our tire size as they didn’t have one in stock either. They called down to another Express Oil Change 10 miles away who had one for us. Instead of putting our young family on a spare tire in an area we didn’t know, they drove down and got the tire for us and changed it there. They had us back on the road in about an hour and half. While I don’t know when we will be back through, I will forever be grateful for their kindness, and professionalism and highly recommend them if you are traveling through.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your vehicle's maintenance needs and making Express Oil Change & Tire Engineers your shop of choice! We appreciate your business and thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our shop Kendra!

name: Marissa Blaylock
text:
This place is awesome!! Dustin was my “tech” and he was incredibly nice and helpful! I use them for all kinds of things!

I am updating this because I recently used them for an issue with my check engine light and my converter was bad in my car! They were excellent, professional, and very great at making sure I got the best deal! Sam, the assistant manager, was always following up and taking care of anything that came up! Would 100% recommend them for something as simple as an oil change to as big as an exhaust issues!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind review, Marissa! We’re happy to be your shop of choice for your auto service needs. If you need anything else, don’t hesitate to give us a call!

name: Patty Griffith
text: I pulled in to an empty parking lot and empty bays. I explained that I wanted an oil change and an alignment. After my oil change my car was put in the parking lot and the shop filled up. Other cars started getting aligned and my car sat there for almost an hour. After asking about it they then put my car on the rack. When I was ready to check out. It gets better. They tell me they couldn’t alignment my tires because it had to be weighted and go to the dealership. (Added: Which is a lie. I was able to take it to NTB and get aligned the next day.) This was my first time at this location and I will not be back.

resp.text: Hi Patty. While we never like for a customer to leave unsatisfied, feedback like this helps us grow as a company. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We value your business and would love to address your concerns as quickly as possible. Please share your contact information, as well as the details you provided here, at www.expressoil.com/contact/ so we can work to resolve your issue. Thank you!

name: Danny Milligan
text: Got great set of tires here and an alignment. The staff are very friendly and the work seems to be good quality.

resp.text: Thank you, Danny! We appreciate the positive review!

name: Kevin Butler
text: The guys at Express Oil Change in Calera did a great job helping me find quality tires for my truck at a great price.  I knew what I wanted and they found them and beat all other prices.  The scheduling of service was convenient an done on my time table.  The shop was clean and the staff were courteous and professional.  I will definitely use them in the future.

resp.text: Hi Kevin! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed the service you received from our team and appreciate the review. The next time your vehicle needs a little TLC, pay us a visit!

name: Mac Dean
text: Brian and his crew at this location are fantastic.  Despite being incredibly busy, they got me in and out very quickly. They give "ChickFilA" type service for the automotive industry.  This is my new one stop shop for all things automotive.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your vehicle's maintenance needs and making Express Oil Change & Tire Engineers your shop of choice! We appreciate your business and thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our shop Mac!

name: Lexi Womack
text:
The service here is impeccable. By far the best location I have been to. Ricky, the manager, greeted me as I was pulling into the parking lot and my service technician, Mike, was very helpful and efficient. I was in and out, full service, in 15 minutes. You can’t beat that type of service!!!
5 stars, fellows!

resp.text: Hi Lexi! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed the service you received from our team and appreciate the review. The next time your vehicle needs a little TLC, pay us a visit!

text: Friendly and excellent service! Express Oil in Calera was very efficient, fast, and professional!  I will definitely do business with them again!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your vehicle's maintenance needs and making Express Oil Change & Tire Engineers your shop of choice! We appreciate your business and thank you for taking the time to share your experience at our shop Melanie!

name: Britt Noelle
text: I happened to be traveling through Calera on my way home, and unfortunately got a flat tire. It was the perfect storm of bad timing, incredibly delayed roadside service, and the literal annoyance of cold and rainy weather. I looked up tire mechanics in the area and happened upon these guys. After a couple of calls to let them know i was still awaiting a tow truck, we realized I might not even make it to them before closing time. And on top of that, if it was deemed that I did need a new tire, they might not have what I needed. It was at this point that the managers asked me where I was located! Wyatt and Sam actually drove to where I was, helped me put my spare tire on, and assisted me safely to the shop. They were busy, and still took incredible care of me. I truly can't thank the team there enough. The customer service is off the charts. Everyone was personable and kind, the shop itself is clean and orderly, and they got me taken care of super fast! Honestly, I am just so thankful to have encountered such a great team. Its too bad I'm not a local, but I'm very thankful that it was in Calera that my tire blew. :) THANKS AGAIN Y'ALL!!

resp.text: Hi, Britt, thank you for the positive feedback! Our team here at Express Oil Change & Tire Engineers is always happy to service your vehicle, and we’re thrilled to hear the customer service was stellar. We look forward to continuing to do business with you in the future!

name: Jamie
text:
i went out to get lunch and noticed my tire was low, so i stopped into the calera location. i pulled in to the parking lot and sat for several minuets and no one came out to great me. so i decided to pull behind one of the bays and wait. after the car in the bay was guided out, they guided my in. i told them i needed my tire pressure checked and after checking them he said one was very low and that i probably needed a patch. i asked how long it would take  (since i just got lunch and needed to take it home to the family)
he told me 20 min. an hour and a half later, no one even came to tell me it was taking a little longer and at one point a customer pulled into the lot and almost drove into the bay because no one was in the oil change area. the driver got out and walked into the waiting room and asked "where are all the employees" i told her i had not seen anyone in a while, she got back in her car and left. terrible customer service.

resp.text: Hi Jamie, we’re sorry you were dissatisfied with our staff and experience during your service. We value your business and would love to address your concerns as quickly as possible. Please visit us at www.expressoil.com/contact/ and leave your contact information, as well as the details of your experience, so we can work to resolve your issue. Thank you.

text: I absolutely Love coming here for my vehicle's service! All of the staff is extremely personable and courteous, and they always keep me abreast of what's going on with my car, in addition to recommendations of what's needed. They are honest, reliable and the maintenance performed is impeccable. I'm a lifetime customer!

name: Simply Alluring
text: DO NOT TAKE YOUR CAR HERE!!! My mother took her car in to change a tire. They couldn’t get the tire sensor light to go off and asked her to leave it overnight. When she went to pick her car up she was told they couldn’t show her that the sensor issue had been fixed because “it took (the guy) a long time to read how to get the light off and (he) didn’t feel like doing all of that again.” She went up the street to shop and when she opened her trunk 4 cases of sodas and 2 cooler bags were missing. She called several times and was told they’d review the cameras and call her back...that was 3 days ago. Shop with them at your own risk!

name: Rich C
text: I was met by Regina, a sweet young lady behind the counter, and i told her what i needed. She and i walked to my truck to see what the exact size tire i needed. I told her to set me up with her recommendations and i handed her the keys and they immediately started the process of mounting my tires. Everyone was awesome,  very polite and made me feel right at home. Thanks to the whole crew there for the prompt attention and new shoes for my truck! I definitely recommend these guys!

name: Donald Fields
text: Listen.......don’t take your car to any of T Walker Enterprise places. It’s sad how that man handles people. His reputation is not the best and it’s sad when you explain a problem you’ve had and everyone that hasn’t dealt with the owner has a NASTY taste about him. Take your car elsewhere. Many of the places will lie, but to the extreme HE WONT HELP FIX THEIR MESS UP. Don’t settle. Keep all your receipts and make sure that you document EVERY MOVE! Ive had THE WORST EXPERIENCE. Goodyear should be ASHAMED to have him under their franchise. My girlfriend and I are just so frustrated.

name: Monique Lawrence
text: Quick, professional service from friendly staff.

name: Pete Williams
text: To the person who wrote that recent review, I stand with you. I’ll never forget them messing up my car. I had to go back multiple times for something they said they could fix and it just became a line of issues. After all was said and done I was told it was nothing more he could do. I’d like to hear more about your situation!!!

name: Yvaughan Pierce
text: The prices are competitive compared to Walmart for oil changes. However Firestone is the cheapest. Nevertheless you can't beat the polite courtesy and professional quality service provided by Goodyear.

name: Lilia Chao
text: We are from Miami, Florida and got flat tire. The gentleman in the front counter was extremely nice and supportive. We couldn't be more thankful for their service and support

name: ARTISTIC INTELLIGENCE
text: The nightmare Im currently dealing with T Walker Enterprise is enough to place a terrible taste in your mouth. Im writing this to warn anyone who does business with them to be careful. After over  $6000 worth of damage and inconvenience the owner has been terrible with making things right. Gluing a water pump, cutting wires and giving my car back without telling me and having professionals to find the damage was one thing, but the way Thomas Walker has handle me after going for years lets me know that the value of a loyal customer is nothing.  Be careful please. Im willing to expound to anyone who would like more on my situation in hopes that you all avoid this. Please be careful!!!

text: I have used World Class Auto for over 15 years. They are professional and always take excellent care of my cars, including my one owner,  perfect 1999 Mercedes  E 300 turbo diesel which was towed to the shop due to starter not working. The towing company damaged the body of car and the steering ans World Class Auto worked diligently to find the parts and repair my car.  I do not believe any other repair shop would have worked so hard. If you love your car, this is the place to take care of it.

We are always grateful for the opportunity to care for your cars, and we're very glad we could assist you with your Mercedes E 300 trubo diesel's repair needs. As always, if there's anything else we can do for you, please don't hesitate to reach out! Until next time, take care and drive safe!

name: David Schmitt
text: My 2009 Mercedes Benz E350 was making a noise at the right rear and I thought it was the wheel bearing starting to go.  I knew it was an expensive job so I searched for a local MB repair shop and found WCAR.  They ended up diagnosing the problem as the rear differential.  The job was completed quickly, professionally and at a fair price.  I now have an ABS problem I need to repair and will be bringing the car back to get this done.  I would recommend this shop to anyone.  Excellent work done professionally!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, David! It was a pleasure working with you and we're very grateful for the opportunity to service your Mercedes Benz. We really appreciate that you've shared what you enjoyed about working with World Class Auto Repair and we look forward to working with you again when you come back for your ABS repair. Don't hesitate to call if there's anything more we can assist you with. See you next time!

name: Wesley Barber
text: We had our vehicle dropped off.   They kept on top with us to let us know they tow truck driver hadn't dropped off the key.  After they go it, they took the time to research what the codes were and what solutions were available.  They kept me informed the entire time.  I highly recommend them car repairs.  I will use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the recommendation, Wesley! Your support means a lot to us and we're very happy to know you enjoyed working with us as much as we enjoyed working with you. It was a pleasure assisting you with your vehicle's diagnosis and we appreciate the opportunity to help. We look forward to providing you with additional car care in the future! Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair and taking the time to review us.

name: black Jack
text: Great staff. Will refer to anyone. They will get all my business

resp.text: We're so honored to have earned your trust and referral! Thank you for choosing World Class Auto Repair and supporting us with your positive feedback.

name: Darrell Lindsey
text:
I have a 2012 Mercedes S550 and my Air Suspension Strut went out. I called World Class and had it towed in. They called me the next day, told me what was going on and gave me a quote. I promise you, they didn’t try to jack me up and tell me that other things were wrong, they just zeroed in on the problem and fixed it. I said that because I think all of us are looking for straight shooters who are not trying to get over on you... Now, because of high demand of car maintenance and everyone wanting their vehicle to be repaired, I had to wait a few days on my car; but it was explained to me upfront. And because of the excellent service and “Great Price,” it was worth the wait and I will be returning again for all of my future repairs!!! I highly recommend World Class because truly they are “World Class!!”
P.S. Brenden is a super nice guy with great customer service and has a “First Class Business!!!
Way to go World Class!!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Darrell! We're so glad to know you had a five-star experience here at World Class Auto Repair. Thank you for trusting us to care for your Mercedes! It was a pleasure working with you and we are thrilled to know you were satisfied with the quality of our repair, the level of customer service you received, and the pricing of our services. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and for recommending us to others! It means a lot and we are looking forward to your next visit!

text: I drive an older BMW and had to call four places before finding a shop that would work on a car that old. The people at World Class Auto Repair were friendly, helpful, and effective! name: Patrick Dailey
text: I don't normally post reviews, but I feel compelled to pass along my excellent experience at World Class Auto. I had the front/back brakes replaced on my 2011 BMW 328i, and the work was quality, timely, and fairly priced. The staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and generally made the experience as enjoyable as possible. Additionally, the mechanic diagnosed and fixed my broken windshield washer pump without me evening mentioning the issue at first (compared to a certain service provider, who shall remain nameless, who wanted $300 to do it!). I'd give them 6 stars if I could.

resp.text: Wow!  We give customers like this 6 stars also.  We want to take care of our customers by taking care of their cars, and give them one less thing to be concerned with in life.  Thanks for your kind review Patrick.

text: World Class auto repair is a Great alternative to the dealer . They gave me the Star treatment . I recommend them to everyone who want dealer service , but not dealer repair prices . Edward Payne .

name: Don’t Worry
text: Owner quoted me at $700 then some lady quoted me $1100 at checkout. This has happened before because I read a review about this and then it happened to me. Red flags everywhere here. Went elsewhere

resp.text: We're very sorry to hear you were dissatisfied with our service, but are grateful you've brought it to our attention. We invite you to call the shop in order to speak with the owner directly. We'd be happy to address your concerns and frustrations, however I believe the confusion is that you called for an estimate and the fellow you spoke with gave you a price over the phone based on your assessment of the car, but when you brought it in, we gave you an accurate estimate of what your vehicle needed, including both parts and labor.  When you have time, please call (205) 591-7990. We hope to hear from you soon so we may work to resolve the issue. Thank you!

name: David Goodwin
text:
An amazing job with an older Mercedes 300CD!  It has essentially sat for a number years and the service and repair schedule needed to begin again.  They kept in constant contact as they uncovered areas that needed to be addressed with a full explanation and estimate of the work needed.
It was a great experience and and I'm very comfortable in recommending World Class Auto Repair.

name: Jim Wilson
text: Excellent customer service always, great cost-savings, A+++ work!!!

name: John Markus
text: I have used World Class for several years and have been quite satisfied with the quality of the work and value received.  I trust them not to recommend more than I need and to perform any necessary repairs right the first time.  Also, the offer of a ride downtown and back makes the process very convenient.

name: Dwayne Carmichael
text: Do not take your vehicle to this place. I brought my BMW X5 there to have the water pump replaced. They replaced the water pump, but damaged other parts on my vehicle while doing the repair. I was quoted $360 labor to replace the water pump. I called to check on my vehicle later that evening, and Yvonne said that her technician was having a hard time installing the water pump and that they had to charge me an extra hour worth of labor. Who fault is that? I told them no way, so they only charged me the $360 that I was originally quoted. However they did mentioned that my car needed 2 more repairs and quoted me $563 for one and $440 for the other. The $440 repair was for a hose that was damaged while they were changing the pump. The hose cost $40 from the BMW dealership and they said it would be 4 hours of labor, which didn't sound right for a hose. I called 3 other independent shops and was quoted $130 for the same repair parts and labor. The $563 was for a hood latch and cable, the parts at dealer are $80. Yvonne also said it would be 4 hours labor. I called several independent shops and was quoted $200 for parts and labor. I guess 4 is there magic number. When I asked Yvonne to double check those quotes all of a sudden she wasn't able to find the labor rates in the system. How did she come up with those figures initially? Bottom line do not take your car to these ppl. Yvonne charges you whatever she feels like and that's not right.

resp.text: We remember you well.  You brought your car late one afternoon with a coolant leak,  and we drove you across town to take you home. You didn't mention that your hood latch was locked and would not open. We spent quite a while to opened the hood to replace the water pump that you brought for us to install, and you declined the hood repair knowing that it would not reopen once it was shut.  We actually charged less labor to install the water pump than the labor guide prescribes.  We also told you about another coolant leak that you say we caused, but we did not; you also declined that repair.  Yes, we would normally charge more because of the extra work to open your hood because of the latch and cable.  Your car came in with several problems, but none caused by us.  We did our best to accommodate you in every way and we're sorry you left dissatisfied.

name: Rico Suave
text: Dropped my car off for a radiator change. It took about a week to just get an estimate when I was told it would be looked at the following morning. When I finally got the estimate, it was on the high end, quoted a few more hours than normal. Continuously called to try to get information over the next week! Was lied to several times throughout the two weeks and one day for a radiator change! Wasn't even notified when they required another part.  On top of it, the manager/owner referred to me as a "damn Yankee". Great business savvy you moron. If you want over priced work, dishonesty, ignorant management this is the place for you. Honestly, the worst experience I've ever had at a car maintenance facility.

resp.text: Sorry, Mr. Suave, but we have no record of you ever being in our shop.  We take our reviews very seriously, but you must have us confused with another shop.

name: Max Wood
text: I've used other Mercedes non-dealer providers for years.  This is one of the best!

The staff at World Class Auto make me feel welcome, comfortable and always take the time to explain why my car needs a certain repair, what options I have and the timeframe of repair urgency. The repair and ownership team take the time to get to know you and always listen to what I think is going on with my car. Hands down I wouldn't take my car any other place in the Birmingham area for regular maintenance to more complex projects.

Most of the service I have received is on a 2005 BMW x3. They are helping me keep it rolling in good shape.

name: John Petit
text: To anyone in the Foley, Gulf Shores and Orange Beach area who needs engine repair, please strongly consider Fausak.  I gave them 5 stars and took the time to write a review and here is why.  They performed the service review on my 2015 Toyota Avalon with 70K miles and it was missing badly and seemed like a coil pack problem.  The original diagnosis and estimate came in around $650.  I gave them the verbal to proceed and they called back an hour and half later to tell me that their original diagnosis was incorrect and that they found the problem.  A beach mouse/rodent chewed the fuel line to one of the cylinders and the bill would be $136 parts and labor.  I was overjoyed and consider that an incredible testimony to their honesty and integrity.  I will do business with them whenever I can in the future and I recommend them highly.

resp.text: John, we appreciate you sharing your experience. It is important to our business to treat our customers with respect and honesty when it comes to their auto repair needs. Thank you for coming to us with your Toyota Avalon and we look forward to working with you next time!

They were so accommodating, fixed his tire, and even found another nail in another tire and fixed it.  They did it quick and we were back to our vacation within an hour.  I highly recommend this place.

resp.text: It was our pleasure to take care of the punctured tires on your son's vehicle and get your family back to your vacation! We appreciate you sharing this experience and if there are any auto repair or tire services we can assist with in the future, just let us know!

name: M. Tyler Arthur
text: Stopped in to check a deflated tire and was told a ( perfectly fine otherwise) tire cannot be repaired/plugged more than once. Upon a quick search - this isn't the case at all! Fausak will not see my cars again. Honesty and trust are most important to me and was let down on both fronts.

resp.text: Mr. Arthur,  Thank you for reaching out to us and pointing out our miscommunication.  Your tire had a puncture that was too close to a prior repair and together the repairs would have overlapped.  This makes the tire unsafe to repair according to the Tire Industry Association and the US Tire Manufacturers Association.  Our top priority is the safety of all our guests and employees, and ultimately every other car on the road.  We failed to explain these guidelines accurately which led to the misunderstanding and for that we apologize.  We have sent a copy of the excerpts from each of these guidelines to you.   If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to reviews@fausaktire.com or call the Foley store.  Thank you.

resp.text: Brandi, we are sorry that you did not find our prices appealing. Our staff works hard to provide elite quality and repairs while also staying competitive within the industry. Thank you for the feedback.

name: Jerry Campbell
text:
EarIier this year I had a 1987 S10 with a 350ci worked on for worked on for 30+ minutes  and was charged zero.  Dennis Morgan the service manager said the mechanic was unable to  improve it but also stated what needed to be done and if I needed them to let them know.  Thanks Dennis Morgan..

In August I returned with the same auto after someone else worked on it. They did the fine tuning for $25.50.  I should have used them for the complete repair instead of wasting alot of money and time? A very costly mistake on my part.

Thanks Dennis Morgan (Manger) and Jesse Simmons (Mechanic)

I would use them again and highly recommend them to anyone who wants to be treated fairly and needed help at a very fair price! They let you make the decisions and apply no pressure to get yor business! Its very hard to find a business like that today!

resp.text: Thanks for the high recommendation, Jerry. Happy we were able to help. Don't hesitate to reach out anytime you need our assistance again. All the best. - David Below

name: Greg Howard
text: I had a car emergency and limped in to their shop early Monday morning. Greg was already there and welcomed me in even though they were not open yet. Greg and the entire staff were friendly and professional. The facility was incredibly clean, both the shop and showroom. I do not hesitate recommending them.

resp.text: I'm so glad we were able to help you out with your car, Greg. My team does their best to make sure our customers are well taken care of and that our work stays fast and exceptional. Thanks for the awesome rating, and if you ever need anything else we're here for you! -David Below

name: Andi Dover
text: He ruined my vehicle!!!! Service manager made me feel 1 inch tall! But he does have a cute nice helpful wrecker driver named Earl!! I wish he was not taken.

resp.text: Andrea, thanks for the review. We're sorry to hear you weren't too pleased though. We will look into this. -David Below

name: Gene Simmons
text: I was taking a trip from Florida to Kentucky and below car clinic treated me and my mother like family even though we had never met. I needed a helicoil done when my spark plug blew out of the head and Wesley took care of it on his lunch break so we would be on our way. They even went and got us lunch while we waited. The world needs more amazing honest people like them. Best experience I've ever had with any auto repair shop. 5 stars all day long

resp.text: Gene, we're so glad you were pleased with the service we provided to you while you were on your trip. It's never good to have an issue -- especially when you're away from home. We hope you're doing well! -David Below

text: Very helpful, great prices, and they don't try to pressure you by keeping you there all day and wearing you down. I'd recommend Below Car Clinic to anyone looking for a vehicle or needing work done on one.  If you are tired of be mistreated try this place.

resp.text: Kevin, thanks for the great review! We're so glad you were pleased with our prices and service, too. Come back again soon! -David Below

name: Garrett Smith
text:
I had came in to get a tire changed. Place was packed out, that's cool, I dont mind.
They have the tire I want but can't put it on the day of because of time constraints, that's okay.
The manager, who's name I will withhold, told me that no other tire shop was open that day and I would have to come back on Monday, although I had already came from Walmart TLE and they were changing tires.
I go up the road and to the other Express Oil and tire center. They have my size tire and change it for me.
Now why the manager of this store lied to me on both occasions is beyond me. I can only assume he was trying to save his sales instead of trying to help a brother out.

I'll be going to the Express Oil on 280, instead. There's good people there.

resp.text: Hi Garrett, we’re sorry you were dissatisfied with our staff and experience during your service. We value your business and would love to address your concerns as quickly as possible. Please visit us at www.expressoil.com/contact/ and leave your contact information, as well as the details of your experience, so we can work to resolve your issue. Thank you.

text: I arrived and was requested to wait. I waited over 20 minutes. They were finished with the two cars in the bay, and yet even once the car in front of me was done being serviced, they moved that car and never signaled me to pull forward. Then to service a car that pulled in to the bay next to me before ever even pulling me up. While having two men service that one vehicle when you had two cars still waiting. I’ve used express before and always have a good experience, but the sylacauga location leaves a lot to Be desired. 2/5 would not recommend

Reasonable price for mounting the tires, checked front end and said it was good, so they didn't charge me for it. Not even a dime!!! I told the manager that good service was hard to find now a days, and that I would definitely be passing the word along that these guys are good honest people.

Also, they got my business again with a front end alignment on my truck a few weeks later. Both vehicles are riding smooth and straight. Can't complain at all. Good people and good service!

text: I had all 5 tire pressure monitors replaced at this location in Dec 2017, I was not told there was no guarantee on the monitors after paying $441.00, 2 have since gone bad. This to me is a rip off and had I been told up front that there was no warranty on the monitors I would never had them installed. I like the oil changes here but in the future will look elsewhere for mechanical work.

text: I had taken my car with a nail in the tire to another local shop where I originally had purchased the tires. I was told that my tire couldn't be repaired due to threads being worn too thin, tires needed to be replaced for $900 I was told.. It looked to me like the tires still had some threads left. So I took it to Greg at Good Year who repaired the tire for $14 and confirmed that the tires had plenty left on the threads. Good to see that there are still good people around with integrity. Thanks for the great service!

They will always take time to explain things to you but the main thing I love going here is because they are honest people. They will not sell you a service you don't need.

name: Lynn R. Perry
text:
While traveling across country my truck suddenly needed repair.  I asked the tow truck driver  to haul me to Alabama Auto; the driver said this station was an excellent choice.  My truck was towed in the back parking lot at 11:30 PM on a Monday night.  At 7: 00 AM the station open and I was out by 10:00 AM with new front hub bearing assembly.
The people were considerate, and competent throughout the process.  I have basic auto repair knowledge and they added to that by patiently demonstrating and showing me specifically what was wrong and how it would be repaired.
When your traveling having your vehicle repaired is a roll of the dice and I won big here.  I have no qualms about taking my vehicle to this station and neither should you.

name: Bo Foster
text: I've been using Alabama Auto Services for a decade to service my vehicles. This business is run by very trustworthy and extremely accommodating people to say the least.  They're very reasonable in terms of maintenance and repair costs and always call to consult with you prior to doing anything to your vehicle.   I highly recommend this local business for automotive service and repair.

text: Got my car radiator fixed and they did a great job!  I highly recommend them.

name: Jenny Seale
text: This business went above and beyond to give us a safe place to land in our time of need. We were pulling our camper from Texas to Florida when our truck broke down on a Friday evening in heavy rain. We were stranded on the eastbound side of the I 10 bridge, just past the U.S.S. Alabama. When my husband called Alabama Auto Service Center, the owner stayed an hour after closing to wait for a tow truck to get us there.  He allowed us to park our camper at his shop overnight and gave us access to his water and electricity so we could use our shower and run fans overnight. Saturday morning our truck was quickly serviced and we were back on the road by 10:30. Thank you Alabama Auto Service Center!

name: Chase White
text: I ordered new tires from an online store and had this service center install them. Very good prices and service. Was in and out in less than an hour. Will do business with again.

name: T Walker
text: Their service was the best. I was run off the road a few hours earlier in the day by a wreckless driver and damaged my tire. I was looking to get it fixed and was pressed against closing time. I arrived and the manager and workers assisted me by repairing my tire. It brought tears to my eyes upon leaving because you rarely find nice people anymore. I greatly appreciated their generous service.

resp.text:
T Walker,

Thank you very much for your generous review and for sharing this experience! It is moments like these that remind us why we are in the auto repair business! We greatly appreciate you for stopping in and look forward to giving you another five-star experience on your next visit! Thanks! - TW

name: Lan Lupe Lòpez
text: Idler arm destroyed because they did not take time to make sure vehicle is safe it is a 4x4 that has a tow package and carries a family very unprofessional.Lugs not tightened correctly cost me a ton of cash just now. They also take down reviews can’t find my other one.

resp.text:
Lan Lupe Lopez,

I am sorry that you had an unsatisfactory visit. We strive to make sure that we do everything with excellence. We have a nation-wide warranty through Goodyear's Tire & Service Network that takes care of all mechanical service that we perform. Could you please call us at 205.664.0810 to help get your problem resolved? Also, I'm sorry you don't see your review. We do not have the ability to remove public reviews. Only Google has that authority. Again, please call us so that we can take care of your matter. Thanks - TW

name: James Davis
text: Was passing through Birmingham when the truck developed a vibration. The staff was wonderful. Told me the problems and the time it would take to fix it. Both were very reasonable and they completed the repairs inside the time given. They even offered to take us to lunch as we were going to be there for several hours.

resp.text:
James Davis,

Thank you very much for the kind and positive review! We love to see that we can make an impact in our customer's lives. Thank you for trusting us. We look forward to taking care of your vehicle again soon if you are ever in the area! Thanks so much! - TW

name: Michele Hayes
text: Excellent service as always! We've been taking all our cars here for years. Paula, Jim, Rick the entire staff are a wonderful.

resp.text:
Michele Hayes,

It has been a pleasure serving you and your family for all of these years! Thank you for sharing such a positive and heart felt review. We strive to make the visit of each of our guests as welcoming as yours! Thank you again and we look forward to taking care of you soon! - TW

name: Quentin Evans
text:
Very nice and helpful staff. My son had a blowout on the highway, and we needed a quick, inexpensive option. Not only did they meet the price mark, but after hearing our situation, they had us out of there in 10 min.

They are now on my short list of tire shops. Excellent job!

resp.text: Quentin Evans, we are greatly appreciative of your five-star review! We are happy that we met your expectations for taking care of your son. As parents ourselves, we know what it is like to make sure that our children are safe and out of harms way. We appreciate the opportunity to take care of your family! Thank you! - TW

name: Emily Clark
text: This location went out of their way to help me when no one else would. Provided quick, friendly service and are true tire professionals! Other tire shops told me it would be 3 days until they could get me a tire, this shop made it happen that day! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Emily Clark, thanks so much for your kind and gracious review of our business! We strive to provide exceptional service for each customer that is in need of assistance. There are many choices to choose from for tire service, but we are happy that we could take care of you! Whenever you visit Birmingham again, you know where you can find auto service! Thanks so much! - TW

name: Nick Casiday
text: The service was high quality, but very slow. I was a walk in with a flat tire, so I expect it to take some time. There were only a couple of people ahead of me and I added an oil change to the patched tire order. It took about 3 hours total. I would suggest using Speedy Tire as an appointment, but not as a walk in.

resp.text: Nick, thank you for the honest review! We will take these measures to the service manager to evaluate. Although, some things may happen out of our control, no matter the case, we strive to make each visit for our customers a pleasant one. Please allow us to take care of you again and to shoot for a five-star experience! Thank you again! - TW

name: Alexandra Smith
text: Friendly and great service. Always available to get me in fast, and understanding of my mood. Of course you never end up at a tire shop when you are having a good day, but they always do whatever they can and suggest the best option.

resp.text: Alexandra, thank you so much for the kind and generous review! We strive to make your visit seamless on each visit. Thank you for trusting us to recommend the best option for you and your vehicle. We look forward to serving you again at the same five-star expectations! Thank you again! - TW

text: Prices were fair, service was excellent.

text: Took my father in laws car in for a flat tire repair. Was taken care of by manager Paula and owner Thomas Walker. Made me feel like my business even for a flat repair was extremely important to them. You can't go wrong here.

Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again! - TW

name: Amber Butler
text: This the worst place for customer service and care. The female manager in there had 0 compassion for anyone and very rude and offensive clearly in her eyes the customer is never right but she certainly is. I wouldn’t sent my daughters power wheels there to even get touched the other staff was very professional and kind but she has given me the worst customer service I have ever experienced in my life and they will NEVER get my business again and I wouldn’t recommend anyone ever using them for anything on your car.

resp.text: Amber Butler, we deeply apologize that you had a poor experience at our location. In the essence of any mistakes that could have been made with your vehicle at our facility, we always ask that you please bring the vehicle to us and not another person or shop. Not only is this for warranty purposes, but because we promise to take care of each and every customer. We strive to be fair and transparent with all recommendations to vehicle problems. I assure you, that our team has discussed this situation immediately. Our team is known for exceptional customer service and we strive to conduct excellence with all customers. We hope that we can be offered another chance to earn your business and trust. Thanks so much! - TW

text: Was disappointed by this place. It was recommended by a friend but both times I went in there, was told about a "problem" I needed to address and went to another place and they said it was not an accurate assessment. I will not be going back.

We apologize that your visits were not satisfactory. It is the goal of our business to give the best recommendation to solve the issues that you have with your vehicle. We hope that we can be given another chance to earn your business! Thank you! - TW

name: Shawn Price
text: Simply Awsome!  I shopped 4 other pelham area tire shops before I picked Speedy-goodyear.  I know it sounds silly, but they delivered 100% on everything they said they would do.  The tires came in when they said, The work was completed when they said, the spare was rotated out like they said.  The best surprise was the price.  The quote was EXACTLY what I was charged...  no hidden fees, no forgotten taxes, just 100%  accurate... and did NOT include the rebate.  All other stores included the rebates as their "best price"... not speedy, the got all the paperwork together for me and said mail it in you would like some money back from Goodyear.  Just awsome people, I would send my mother to this store.

resp.text:
Shawn Price,

We are greatly appreciative of your five-star review! We are more than appreciate of the story that you shared with us. For that, we are grateful! We look forward to continuing to serve you! And yes! We will take care of your mother's vehicle as well! send her our way! Thanks! - TW

name: Megan Mitchell
text: Phenomenal service and extremely friendly and helpful staff! Just moved to Birmingham area and couldn’t have asked for a better experience.

resp.text: Megan Mitchell, thank you very much for the extremely kind five-star review! We strive to make each of our customer’s experience welcoming and hospitable! We look forward to taking care of you again! Welcome to the Magic City! - TW

name: Rakin Abdullah
text: This place is terrible and I witnessed why before I left my car so it's my fault for dealing with them.I witnessed the front desk argue back and forward with a customer about poor improper work performed on his vehicle this past Saturday but I figured I was only getting an alignment and oil change so what the heck.I left my car key and rim key with the front desk and was told I'd hear from them soon but I never received a call so my wife went down right before closing and they were done.The only key that was returned was my car key and magicallyl the rim key is missing .I call them but they were already closed so I called Monday ,went by Monday and called back Monday after getting the run around from the rude ,unprofessional staff who placed the blame on me and my wife about the key.Did you check your car,her car ,and went on to say they didn't have it or ever received it .The problem wasn't the key it was how we were treated but it was the same treatment I saw them give another customer.PLEASE DONT DO BUSINESS HERE !!!! YOU'VE BEEN WARNED !!! now I'm changing my work schedule etc to take care of the key problem that they caused and the work that I got on the car is still doing the same thing!

resp.text: Rakin Abdullah, we are very sorry that you encountered this poor experience at our location. Although, we may make mistakes, but we ask that our customers give us the opportunity to make it right to our upmost ability. In the case of the missing wheel lock key, in no way did we attempt to be condescending when asking questions about it's whereabouts. We are only concerned for your belongings. We made every effort to correct the misplacement by checking in the vehicle to purchasing and replacing the wheel lock keys with no hesitation. Your convenience is important to us, so we offered to pick-up and purchase the wheel lock keys for you. Again, we apologize for this inconvenience. Our team has discussed this situation to prevent any encounters such as these again. We strive to provide exceptional customer service for each customer that walks through our doors. We hope that we can be offered another chance to earn your business and trust. Thank you! - TW

name: Kym Klein
text:
Front desk manager, Paula, is one of the rudest and disrespectful customer service managers I've ever encountered!

My windshield wipers had quit working so I pulled in thinking someone could take a quick look at them and let me know what was wrong. When they asked me to come inside and proceeded to try and open a ticket - I said I'm sorry I thought this was something you could help me with so  I turned to walk out.  As I was leaving, Paula rudely snipped, "Do you work for free?"  Her disrespectful comments were totally inappropriate and uncalled for!

I took the vehicle down the street to O'Reilly's and they came out, in the rain,  to check my fuses - FOR FREE!!!

My experience was appalling! No wonder her bays were empty!!!!

resp.text: Kym Klein, we deeply apologize that you had a poor experience at our facility. Although, we must create an invoice for liability purposes for each vehicle that enters our facility, we strive to be fair and transparent with all recommendations for vehicle issues. Please accept my apology for the comments made. Our team has discussed this immediately. Our team is known for exceptional customer service and we strive to display this with each and every customer - no matter the circumstance. We hope that we can be granted another chance to earn your business and trust! Thank you! - TW

name: Tiffany Walls
text: I absolutely ADORE Brian and Tammy! They have serviced my Hyundiai Tucson as well as a second vehicle for our family. In August 2019, I had my AC compressor replaced. I had shopped around some other businesses (including Firestone, which I would NEVER recommend) and I was quoted a far more reasonable price for parts and labor through Brian's. Brian took the time to diagnose my issue, explain what he would do to my vehicle, how the part worked and why the part that needed replacing wasn't working properly. After the repair, Brian took the time to have me look and listen to the new part, showed me the broken part before he disposed of it and even gave me some insight to another belt that may need replacing at a certain point. They won us over with their communication, responsiveness, kindness and honesty. They have customers for life because they did such a stellar job! Wonderful experiences at this shop!

name: Ethan Lake
text: Absolutely the best experience I have had with a mechanic. I called several of the places around to see if I could bring my truck by and this was definitely the friendliest of them. Tammy answered my phone call and was beyond helpful. I instantly took the truck by and Brian greeted me as soon as I arrived. For the first time, a mechanic (Brian) actually took the time to hear me out and see what I thought the issue was. He checked various things in the truck and under the hood. He did a little tinkering and sent me on my way with no more problems! I will definitely be back, and for anyone else new to this area and looking for a place to get your vehicle fixed, go see Brian!

resp.text: Thank you Ethan!  We appreciate your review and look forward to helping you in the future.

name: john chafton
text: Highly recommend Brian's Automotive, Tammy and Brian are wonderful people and they take the time and listen to you. I have a 2004 Chevy Silver ado 4 wheel drive and he has changed the transmission for me and some other work and he does great work. He does stay busy so he may have to keep your vehicle a little longer than normal but its worth it. Thanks Tammy And Brian.

text: Brian is a great person first off and very honest. I highly recommend him. He’s gonna tell you EXACTLY what’s wrong with your car, but he also explains it to you in a way you can understand. Then will explain what’s going on, and what’s  being done to fix it.

resp.text: Mike, we appreciate the opportunity to work on your truck.  We also appreciate the very kind review. Thank you!

name: matthew basaraba
text:
I been using this station for oil changes for years. If they didn't have good service i wouldn't have kept going back time and again..

Brought my Porsche Boxster for an oil change after buying it this week. Came in early so there was no wait to get into the shop, however, before checking if they even had an oil filter to fit they drained my oil then told me they didn't have one and started calling around town to locate one. They found one but it was a 20 minute drive away and since they had already drained the oil I was left with no options but to wait.

name: Joshua Kirts
text: I was stranded on the interstate with my wife and one year old daughter in the blistering heat in desperate need of help (hundreds of miles from home); I had a flat tire and when I pulled the spare from the trunk, it too was also flat.  A man pulled up asking if I needed help, I told him what was going on and he said that he would take the tire, that initially caused us to be stranded, and repair it at his place of employment (THE CHANGE) and bring it right back.  After returning with my repaired tire I tried to give him money, he refused, I tried to convince him to take the money, but he still refused.  Really the only request he had was to pray with him; therefore, my family and an additional driver that pulled over to help prayed with this unknown man on the side of the interstate.  All I know is that this man worked for "THE CHANGE".....The moral of this story is we live in a time where ethics are not always important to the standard employee, and with vehicles becoming more and more difficult to work on, we rely on mechanics and businesses to be honest.  If "THE CHANGE" hires other employees like this unknown man, I would be a customer for life.

text: No ones never at the shop and he never returns call not good business

name: André Garcia
text:
It's ok for the price.  However the reason they don't get the extra 3 stars is because they are always trying to sell you stuff you don't need, which is why I stooped coming back to this place before. Decided to give it a try and it was the same think.

The service guy called me in the garage to show me "something on my car".  He had the air filter open and he pointed to it and pointed to my EXHAUST MANIFOLD and told me that my injectors and inside "there" was full of  "gunk" and that I needed a fuel injector cleaning for $59.   FIRST, the fuel injectors are NOT inside the EXHAUST MANIFOLD or the air filter.  Second, unless you took apart my valve cover you HAVE NO IDEA how clean/dirty my injectors are.  My car is fairly new which quite low mileage and very well maintained,  don't try to scam me into something that I DON'T need,  or even if I did you wouldn't know simply by pointing to my Exhaust Manifold.

There is a good reason the place across the street "Firestone" was packed with people and they are more expansive and this place was empty.  It's called HONESTY.

resp.text:
Dear André,
We are sorry your last visit to our auto shop did not meet your expectations. Our staff is well trained to identify maintenance issues on each vehicle we diagnose. We are a family owned honest, friendly, and affordable auto maintenance shop. We'd greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss your concerns further, in hopes of reaching a positive resolution. Please contact one of the owners at your earliest convenience, in hopes of making this right with you. Thank you!
~ Jamie and Rick Martin, Owner of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham
(205) 637-5523

name: Jade Howlet
text: I never had an experience so BAD! I get my tires rotated and oil changed. I come back to get the same services done. The mechanic tells me whoever rotated my tires last stripped my lug nut post. When they realize they were the ones who did it they tell me I need to sign a waiver for them to try to fix it or pay for a whole new post! I will never be back!

resp.text:
Dear Jade,
We really appreciate our customers and continuously strive to provide excellent customer service. Our records do not show you as a client of ours. Is there a possibility the transaction is under a different name? We are happy to discuss any issues you might have with your vehicle and try to reach a reasonable solution.
Please give us a call at (205) 637-5523 at your earliest convenience. Thank you!
~ Jamie and Rick Martin, Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Trent Daniels
text: Front desk lady was very nice. The gentleman working on my truck was very informative. I always come here for an oil change, doesnt take long at all. You cant beat these prices

resp.text:
Dear Trent,
We wanted to say a big "thanks" for your nice review. We will certainly pass along the compliments to our staff. We enjoy taking great care of our customers by delivering affordable pricing and efficient services. Customers like you make our jobs rewarding and enjoyable. Thank you!
~Rick and Jamie Martin, Owners of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Justin McClew
text: Nice people that don't do nice work. Took it for the premium oil change. Told me all the belts and hoses looked good, air filter was good everything is topped off, but my radiator was leaking. Soon as I left there was a big vibration in it... Let the car sit for 3days, both radiator hoses needed to be replaced, leaking because of corrosion, the air filter was horrible, the pcv valve was clogged, power steering that doesn't leak was empty and the vibration was because they put 2 quarts more oil than the engine was supposed to have!! Quoted me a price to get a radiator when it was a hose they told me was good!

name: monica mitchell
text: I am sitting here now for the third time since a tune up and oil change last week. As soon as I drive off I noticed my car was missing in a cylinder. Had to come back and get a coil replaced immediately. Also my power steering fluid was extremely low and my coolant level was low. once again drove off and noticed oil burning. I couldn't come right back but came back a few days later and it was the plug gasket. So either it wasn't checked when the oil was drained or the tightest plug too tight. Once again even left after gasket replace and car is still burning oil. Now it smokes too. Telling me it's the axle boot which is messed up but none of this began until immediately after I've left from getting service done here. I'm so disappointed because the last time I was here I had such a good experience I thought I had found my new spot to get work done on my car.

resp.text:
Dear Monica,
We are very sorry you are experiencing auto issues. We have checked our records and our auto center does not show the name used on the review as a customer at our auto shop. We would like to assist you in finding a positive resolution and ask that you give one of us a call at the number shown below. We are happy to talk with you at your earliest convenience. Thanks so much!
~Rick and Jamie Martin, Owner of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

(205) 637-5523

name: Kristyn Taylor
text: I drive all the way from Southside to bring my car here. They are faster than that express place, at half the price but with better service.  The last time I was there, the tech noticed how terrible my headlights were and let me know they were running a special to fix them for just $20. Now I don't have to drive with my brights on!

name: Mrs. Williams
text: DO NOT TAKE YOUR CAR HERE!!! I REPEAT!! SAVE YOUR CAR AND MONEY AND GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!! My husband took his Classic Car here for an detailed  job , after picking up the vehicle the following Monday it would not crank. Upon returning my husband was told that they will not be able to work on his car after receiving the money to fix the issue.

resp.text:
Dear Mrs. Williams,
We are saddened to read this review. Our staff has tried to work with your husband and his classic car in a patient, honest, and friendly manner. We feel like we have done everything we could to assist you and wish you all the best.
~Jamie and Rick Martin, Owners of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham
