text: They corrected several issues that left my car unsafe. They were fast, courteous and did a great job. I'll be recommending them to friends!

resp.text:
Dear Jeremy,
Thanks so much for posting the 5-star review of our auto services. It is so nice to read that you received fast and courteous auto repair services during your recent visit to our shop. The recommendations are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you again. All the best!
~Rick and Jamie Martin, Owners of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham

name: Drew Cottrell
text: Ive heard this location has been shut down but ive been here recently, great service

resp.text:
Hello Drew,
Your patronage at our auto center is greatly appreciated. Thanks for the compliment on our auto services.

You are correct, we have closed this location and plan to relocate about 25 miles away close to Finley Avenue and Farmers Market. We also have a Precision Tune Auto Care center in Alabaster, which is only 6 miles away from our old Pelham shop.

We hope to see you again so we can continue providing you with excellent auto maintenance services. Thank you!
~ Jamie, Owner of Precision Tune Auto Care

name: D F
text: They test the cars they service by flying up and down hilltop business dr as fast as they can.

resp.text:
Dear Drew,
Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We too have noticed that there seems to be a lot of vehicles driving faster than they should on Hilltop Drive. Please know that we have addressed this concern with  our employees and have emphasized how important it is to follow the speed limit at all times. Safety is our number one concern in our shop, and also as we test drive any vehicles. If you have any additional questions, or concerns, please feel free to call the store manager, Kevin Gainey, at (205) 637-5523. Thank you very much!

name: Amy Lynn Butler
text: I WAS a long time client until this weekend when they over charged us (found out too late after spending over $650!!) & my husband gave them instructions to leave our car locked outside of their shop, for us to pick up, since we couldn't come until after they were closed. Not only was our car not outside for us, it was still on the rack with the hood up in the shop!! We had to back track to our house & my husband was late for his job! We are VERY disappointed. We have literally spent thousands there through the years. And we are done.

name: Jennifer Cargile
text:
My husband went in with his CRV on a Saturday about 9am for a normal oil change and a check engine light, was told that he needed some spark plugs and new oil pan gasket (there were NO oil leaks that we had noticed, and we were told it was loosing 80% of its oil) and was told it wouldn't take long at all, maybe an hour,  well he didn't leave until after 12 (receipt said 1217). He asked multiple times if it was ready, was told only 20 more mins, then 30...well 2 hours after the said time he left. We had plans at 11am, so those didn't happen WHICH could have been planned for-like loading up my kids (one being a newborn) in the car and picking him up. No apologies for the extra wait time and never honest about how long it was going to take.
Come that following week, SURPRISE, there was an oil leak on the garage floor AND the check engine light was back on. So we took it back once again. He was told that it was just old oil coming out and it was fine and that some other piece needed to be replaced for the check engine light. Like why wasn't this fixed the first time!? Unless we got super unlucky and something went wrong within the 3/4 day time.

Well now it's about 4 months later and there's still oil spots on the floor!
So we called today, I got a so-so person on the phone and was told to bring it back in, no "oh my goodness! That's not what we like to hear..please bring it back in!" It was just "bring it back".

1st, can we make the comparison on the comment from Ashton Morgan below?? This was the SAME day, the SAME time and my husband remembers talking and waiting with Ashton.
We aren't very knowledgable on car repairs and we should've gotten a 2nd opinion(the Garage in Pelham is literally walking distance and everyone always has great things to say about them, but this was just for a cheap oil change-never again!) ..but we just had a baby and didn't have much spare time or sleep to decide these things with a clear mind.

I just reccomend going somewhere else for piece of mind EVEN for an oil change, even if this was just a random bad day (which look at the rating-use your brains people! We didn't and now we're paying for it with our time and now a nasty driveway and garage floor) for the people working on cars, there has yet to be a verbal apology-and now if we get one it will just seem forced.

resp.text:
Dear Jennifer,
My name is Rick and I am the owner of Precision Tune Auto Care of Pelham. We wanted to apologize for the long wait during your last visit with us. We know our customers time is valuable and we always strive to provide a reasonable time estimate on each service we perform. I can assure you we addressed the waiting issue and are thrilled to have a new store manager.

Our records show we serviced your vehicle in early February 2016. We offer a 12-month warranty on all services and encourage you to contact us at (205) 637-5523 to set up a follow-up appointment. Since your vehicle has over 189,000 miles on it, there may be another leak requiring some attention. We look forward to making this right with you. Thank you!

Rick Martin

text: People there were really nice and I would go back there

name: Matt
text: Highly recommend shopping around before choosing this place. Most importantly I dropped my car off and was told I’d get a call with a quote before the work was started for approval, I never got that call and was only called once the job was completed and told the cost of the repair. The amount of the repair was on the high end for repairs and definitely warranted a call before any work was done. I’d understand if the repair cost was less than 1k but this job was not and I just had to take their word for it that that’s what was needed. The owner of the place had the great response to my questioning of why I wasn’t called of, well why did you have your car towed here if you didn’t want it fixed, and that they can just put my old parts back in it and let me tow it away. Incredibly unprofessional response for the owner of a shop, he could have at least owned up to the mistake and I wouldn’t have been as bothered by the lack of communication. Instead he tried to put the blame on me and his front desk employee. If you want a professional mechanic to work on your car do not take it here, if you saw where this shop was and looked you’d probably choose to turn away anyway but before you get there take my advice and keep looking for other options.

name: Big D's Shade Tree
text: They took the time to check out my truck. Ran all sorts of computer scans, did a road test, and even out it up on jacks to have a look underneath. My problem was deemed to unrelated to the transmission. They told me what to do to fix it myself or where I could take it. When I tried to pay, he said No Charge. Other shops wanted $50 just to look at it. I have a new transmission shop that will be doing all my work from now on.

name: Tracy Armstrong
text: Great people! Took a look at the car for free... Another shop said I needed a transmission rebuild/ replacement based off a engine code alone originating from an air intake hose disconnect. Madison transmission said nothing was wrong with the transmission and sent me on my way and told me to come back if I have any issues with the car.

text: Great price for a brand new transmission! They are the place to go to for any transmission issues.

name: Ken Klispie
text: Excellent service! The team at Guthrie's did a thorough inspection of our new/used minivan after it started making various intermittent sounds from a long cross country drive. They were able to pinpoint several issues that were small but would have left us stranded on our next big trip. Quick, very reasonable and communicative through the repairs. We did our next long trip without any issues or noises. We know where we will be taking all of our cars for service, thank you!

resp.text: Thank you, Ken for the review. We appreciate your business. We are happy to help with your automotive needs. Welcome to Alabama!!!

text: We were traveling through Alabama and my pickup broke down right off the 310 Cullom exit. The tow truck driver recommended Guthrie.  We were nervous not knowing anyone but were pleasantly surprised. We received text updates and a phone call to explain what needed to be done.  They exceeded our expectation completing the job quickly and at a fair price. Highly recommend their auto shop. God Bless.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Steven. We appreciate your kind words. We always try to get people back on the road. I know what it is like to be broken down on the road. Especially if you are on a schedule. Thank you so much for choosing Guthrie's Auto Service.

text: Our car started experiencing some pretty severe issues on our drive home to Tennessee from Florida. We genuinely could not have chosen a better exit to pull over at! We pulled Guthrie's Auto up on our Maps and decided to take our car over there. Despite how busy they were, they were very understanding that we were from out of town and immediately got to work on our vehicle and offered recommendations on places to eat around since we had to wait several hours! Absolutely awesome service!

resp.text: We appreciate your words, and the 5 stars. We strive to give everyone a 5 star experience and help them along their way. Thanks again. Terry Guthrie

Thank You So much for not only getting our truck fixed but for your kind & thoughtfulness.
Rick, Barbara & LACI

name: Page Sparks
text: A couple years ago my car was really in a bad way, and took it to the dealership. They were going to charge me $1500 for my repair. I despaired and reached out to friends and family for recommendations. A good friend recommended Guthrie's, said they always did good work. So I called them up. For the same repair they were going to have to charge close to $900. It was better but still hurt. Took my car up and waited. Got a call from Mike and he said that he wanted to check over the car before I spent all that money. He discovered what the dealership didn't, that something was just unplugged. Only charged the diagnostic fee! He could have charged me fully, but he and this business have been ethical. I take my car to them anytime I have issues, and they've been precise and sure every time. Would highly recommend for anyone who's been burned by bad mechanics.

resp.text: Page, thank you for your review. We were happy to have been able to help you out with your vehicle and to save you money. We appreciate having you as a customer and we look forward to seeing you next time!

text: Very caring and reliable crew Terry and them have always took care of our car needs and always does a fantastic job! Great prices and they get it done it a timely manner

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! We'll continue to provide a caring and reliable atmosphere for your auto repair needs and we look forward to helping you in the future!

text: Took my vehicle to have my AC looked at. They were very friendly and knowledgeable. Seemed to want to help me more than just make a dollar. They have a text system set up that notifies you when your vehicle is being worked on. The owner follows up with you a day or so after you pick up your vehicle to be sure everything is going well. Very personable business.

resp.text: Felicia, thank you for your review! We're happy to have looked at your A/C and we'll continue to be friendly and knowledgeable.

text: Broke down while traveling. They was very helpful and willing to get our truck repaired at very reasonable rates. I highly recommend Guthrie's Auto Service.

resp.text: John, thank you for your review, we hope you had safe traveling after visiting our auto repair shop, and please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Bettie Burnett
text: Had car towed to Guthrie's for repair on coolant system. Had been told by two regular customers that they do really good work. The office attendant (Mike, I think was his name), was straight-forward, respectful, patient, gave me a phone quote, had the work done timely, with the final bill ending up being a little less than the original quote, even after adding the tow bill & taxes. It was a very welcomed change from the experience I'd had at another local shop I'd been referred to (but later warned about from several other past customers) where I repeatedly had to endure rudeness from the know-it-all mechanic, immediate breakdowns from same issue I'd just paid to have repaired, & ignored voicemails asking to speak to the owner. Guthrie's owner followed-up the very next day to make sure everything was going well with the work on my car. I would much rather pay for a job well done the first time than a little less and keep breaking down, having my car towed, finding another way to work at the last minute to keep my job, and then constantly being talked down to in person & over the phone (while the owner justifies it as him "being from New York",... to which I reminded them both that he's now n ALABAMA, & that cocky attitude won't do here, especially with me!!... 3 different types of repairs... never fixed after being told they were!). So, yes, I am very happy to give Guthrie's a positive review, THANK YOU!

resp.text: Bettie, thank you for your review. We were happy to help out with your coolant system repair and we are glad to be respectful, honest, and patient for all of our customers. We are sorry you had a bad experience at a different shop, but thank you for trusting us to get the job done. See you later!

text: Took my '08 Tundra in for some pretty major repairs (stuck secondary air intake valve, timing belt replacement, pulley repair). I’m beyond pleased with the quality of the work, the affordable price, and the speed of service you guys gave me. I’m new to the area, and will be coming back to you guys for any vehicle work that I need, and I’ll make sure to tell everyone else I meet about you as well! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Randy! We're glad we could help you out with your '08 Tundra repairs, and we'll continue to offer quality and affordable auto repair services, and we are excited to have you as our customer. See you next time!

text: My truck needed help. I planned on it being in the shop for 7 to 10 days. I dropped it off on a Monday afternoon, and received a call on Friday afternoon that it was ready. They did a great job. No vibration, shaking, or leaking. Awesome job guys. Thanks.

resp.text: Mark, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! Here at Guthrie's Auto Service, we understand how important your vehicle is to you. That is why we always strive to provide quality care in a timely manner. It was a pleasure to work on your truck and we're thrilled to hear that your drive to Gulf Shores was smooth. We look forward to your next visit!

Thank you and please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you in the future!

text: Needed help tracking a power draw draining my battery, they found it and got everything sorted very quickly. I was very pleased with the service and I will absolutely use them for future repairs.

name: Douglas Ballenger
text:
I was really surprised by the service and friendliness of Guthries auto service, after I spent 2 weeks working on my vehicle with no luck finding the problem I decided to find a shop to work on it. A friend of mine recommended Guthries. Some of problems I was having with my vehicle was, lost power to all of my windows, lost power to my rear view mirror and backup camera, blown bulb in taillights, short causing battery to drain, could not turn ignition switch All the way off so I couldn’t get key out 🤔😂 but the power door lock still worked!!
But don’t lock them if you have something draining your battery ! 🙃 Seriously Guthries will be my go to from now on ! Very friendly service, very knowledgeable and very fair service pricing!! I’m not going to say what my vehicle problem was ask Mike when you take your vehicle 🚗 in.

To all at Guthries auto service,

Thank you 🙏

resp.text: Douglas, we appreciate your kind review. We were more than happy to help you out of a tricky situation with your vehicle, and we'll continue to be friendly, knowledgeable, and fair-priced for your future visits. Thank you and we'll see you again!

text: Great service and repairs. Called me as they found issues and got my approval before all repairs. Even checked with me the next day to make sure everything was working. I will take my other vehicles there for any service or repairs. Very satisfied customer!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Rachel! We are glad to have you as a customer, and we'll continue to be here for your automotive repair needs while being friendly and professional.

name: Joe Cook
text: Guthrie’s Auto Service is the only service center I trust with servicing my vehicles. They are dependable,  thorough and reasonably priced. Terry and his team definitely know their stuff.

resp.text: Joe, thank you for your review. We're happy we have earned your trust for all of your automotive repair needs. We will continue to be dependable, thorough, and reasonably priced and we look forward to your next visit!

text: We have been using Guthrie's for over two years to take care of our import cars and my old Mountaineer.  They have done a great job and have stood behind their work.  We appreciate their professional service and highly recommend their team -- both Terry and Mike offer knowledgeable  assistance.

resp.text: Thank you Phyllis for your continued loyalty with us! We are so glad that we can continually provide your cars with the services they need and provide you with  knowledge and comfort regarding your services! Thanks again and see you next time!

name: Jane Brannon

resp.text: Thank you Jason! We're happy to have had your family as customers and will continue to provide great customer service when it comes to our automotive repair for you! Thank you for trusting us.

text: I called and scheduled an appointment on a Wednesday for a that Friday.  I had never been in before as I haven’t lived in Cullman long. The guy at the front took my info and they had my car in within a few minutes. I was expecting to leave it there for the day and had a friend on their way to pick me up.  My car was ready before they got there. (A/C leak). Two days later I get a text from the manager following up to make sure I was satisfied and to make sure the A/C was working properly. That alone will have me going back when I need service again.

resp.text: Chris, we are glad that you had such a positive experience at our shop for your A/C leak. We do our best to be quick and thorough for our customers because you guys are our priority. Thank you for your review and we're happy that we have gained a new customer!

name: southvinemont
text: Everyone is so nice & helpful. They charge very reasonable rates and do quality work.  They inspected a Volvo i recently purchased and have given me nothing but top notch service and treatment.  Even giving me a ride home.. I definitely will be a returning customer and highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thanks for the recommendation! We appreciate and value all of our customers, when we receive feedback like this it fuels us to keep working hard every day! Thank you!

name: Matt Franks
text: I thoroughly enjoy doing business with the entire family. In fact, they feel like family and carry on conversations with me while I’m there. You definitely get a home town feel and the prices are reasonable

resp.text: We love having you around, Matt! Thank you!

name: Kim Elrod
text: Terry and his staff and very honesty, friendly, and courteous. I feel comfortable taking our vehicles to him and know that they will get the work done in a reasonable amount of time and for a reasonable price.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review, Kim! We're happy to be honest, friendly, and courteous for your auto repair and maintenance needs. We look forward to having you back in our shop for a timely and reasonably-priced auto service!

name: Wesley Dawsey
text: Guthrie's is a great locally owned shop that has kept 4 older vehicles running for me over 7 years. They warranty their work and conduct business in a way to preserve their reputation. I'm sure there are other good shops in town, but I wouldn't go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you, Wesley! We are glad to have you as a customer!

name: Elizabeth Gervais
text: Great place. Every one is friendly and honest. They were very kind while we waited for our car to be serviced.

resp.text: Thank you Elizabeth for your review! We will continue to offer friendly and honest auto repair service, and we look forward to assisting you in the future!

name: Mike Howell
text: Quick and efficient work, extremely nice and polite people very helpful, I will carry all my vehicles there from now on!!

resp.text: Mike, thank you for your review. We will continue to offer efficient, timely, and polite auto repair services for all of our customers, and we are glad to be your go-to auto shop! We will see you next time!

name: Bill McCartney
text: Nice people to do business with and do an excellent job the first time!  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Bill! We're happy to offer excellent and quality auto repair services, and we'll see you next time!

text: Reasonable prices, fast service, courteous. I would recommend to others.

resp.text: John, thank you for leaving us a review! We will continue to offer timely, courteous, thorough, and reasonably priced auto repair services for our customers. We were happy to help with your Ford, and we look forward to seeing you next time!

name: Survival For Singers
text: Terry and his crew were absolute life-savers.  We were traveling down through town when our alternator went out.  He made time for us even though he had a full shop, and did the repair for us that same day, working through lunch with his crew.  He did excellent work, was honest about the repairs needed, and charges good rates.  We cannot say enough about how wonderful our experience was.  I would HIGHLY recommend Guthrie's to anyone.  Thanks Terry and crew!

resp.text: We appreciate the feedback, Tyler! We look forward to working with you in the future! Having customers like you is what fuels us on a day-to-day basis to be our best!

text: I like the service, and it didn't take long, plus my girlfriend is happy.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are glad we can provide a quality service for you and your girlfriend, and we look forward to having you back in our auto repair shop next time!

name: Mama Hipster
text: Guthrie’s Auto Service went above and beyond to help me when my alternator went out in my car. I made one call and they got a wrecker to pick up the car and tow it to his shop. They replaced the alternator and had me back on the road as quickly as possible. And the price was reasonable too!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your story! We appreciate the review and look forward to working with you in the future!

text: Took my car in at 8am and they looked it over and fixed it by 5pm same day! Prices were reasonable. Everyone there was very nice and they explained the issues cleary. Would recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your story! We appreciate the review and look forward to working with you in the future!

name: Jim Amos
text: Thanks to Terry and his Team for fixing my car! Competent service performed by motivated professionals at a fair price! It just don't get no better! It is a mistake not to give Terry and his Team a chance to help you with your automotive repair needs!

resp.text: Thanks for the review! We appreciate it, Jim!

name: Brian Dobbins
text: This place is AWESOME. I appreciate everything Terry did for me and my truck when it died on a Friday afternoon at closing time. My wife and I were 4 hours from Home and stranded. Terry waited for us to get a tow from Snead,AL to his shop. He got right to it Monday morning and actually found the problem was other than what I had thought so the repair was gonna be less than first quoted.  I greatly appreciate the honesty and quickness. Everything about this place is AWESOME.

resp.text: Good morning, Brian!  Wow, thank you for your kind words!  We are always happy to help.  We are glad we could get your vehicle back up and running as quickly as we could.  Thank you for taking time out of your day to leave us a review here on Google! Take care.

They charged my mom nearly $30 for a $0.50 headlight bulb and then had the nerve to charge her another $78 to replace the bulb. I went through her invoices of the work they did and they overcharged her 100's of dollars on other items. I looked up premium parts for her truck and it still came up costing less. Don't use them unless you want to be conned .

Update: They obviously can't read either. It was my mom that they overcharged, not me.

resp.text:
Jared,

Customer service and honesty are what we take the most pride in here at Guthrie's Auto Service. Unfortunately, we are unable to find anybody in our system by the name of Jared Lumpkin. If you could reach out to us at your earliest convenience, we would love to hear more about your experience and how what we can address your concerns and make it right by you. (256) 739-1690

Thank you.

text: Originally went here to get transmission work done on my dodge, and everything was smooth for about two months. Then, my battery light comes on and I get someone to look at it. Alternator problems again. Whoever worked on it previously, had left a few things unfinished. Took it back here because it was under warranty, and Michael Benson was incredibly rude to me and my husband. He looked and acted as though we were a HUGE inconvenience. He even told my husband, "I don't know why she didn't just take it to the other location." (referring to me. ) Would not recommend. That employee just completely ruined my experience with this company.

text: Amazing!!! Danelle was so kind and helpful. From out of town and needed assistance with my tire and they went over and above of what I expected! Recommend to anyone who is looking for friendly hometown service.

name: Jake Jones
text: Great place. I'm usually out in 30-45 minutes when getting oil changed. The key to not waiting hours is to not go when everyone else does (as is with any other service). They offer shuttle service to the surrounding areas. They seem to retain their employees which means you are getting experienced techs each time. Recently when getting my oil changed, the tech found $10 in my seat. They made a point to bring it to me. To me this showed that I can trust them (in all honesty I didn't even know it was there!) I've also gotten tires here and they gave me a great price and did a great job.

name: ashli Jennings
text: Always a great experience.  Great customer service!

name: Bill Wolfe
text:
First visit I woke up to oil all over my garage floor the next morning.  Care was not taken to capture the oil when they changed it and left my skid plate full of oil which resulted in the mess.  Not to mention the oil that blew all over my exhaust and the smell I had to tolerate.  Complained to manager and received a sincere apology.  He asked that I give them a chance to do it right.

Second chance...  Leaving on a trip Saturday.  I called Thursday to inquire about an appointment.  I was told they do not accept appointments but they will be happy to work me in Friday.  I took 2 hours of vacation in order to allow ample time for my oil change and tire rotation (arrived at 1:00 PM).    When I arrived I was told they were not accepting any more oil changes for the day.  I explained I had called the previous day and was told that I would be  accommodated.  The reply from the counter was "Don't know what to tell ya..." while bouncing a pen on the counter and sucking air through his teeth.

There won't be a third chance.

text: Great service. Great people!

All around great experience!

First time there. I heard a lot of good things about them from friends. They were very friendly, and they had good and speedy service. I was in there, and out, faster then I expected for a Saturday. I had an alignment and new tires. They gave me options on various tires and specials. The prices were reasonable, and the service great.

Update- 8/10/19
Went there early because I had a leak in my tire. I was turned away, because of "over-bookage". There was nobody sitting in the lobby either. I previously spent $500.00 for new tires and alignment, and I posted a good review on that. So, I went back again. I drove 20 minutes to get there, because I do not live close to their shop. I get, " Sorry... we cannot help you today". They cannot do a simple tire patch on one of the tires that I brought from them? I would have waited on that to be done too. This is poor, and unacceptable customer service. I got it patched at another tire shop, Jim Whaley tires. That tire shop was extremely busy, but they still waited on me. I will not be going back to A-One Tires, if that is how they operate.

name: Mark Richards
text:
On Tuesday Nov. 29 2016 I was traveling west on HWY 84 in Alabama and my Tahoe began to have an extreme vibration. The vibration was not in the steering wheel but the chassis. It felt like a u-joint to me so I proceeded slowly at 25mph to try and locate help. I pulled into the A-1 Tire Sale & Service Goodyear dealer and asked if they could repair my vehicle and what I thought it was. They said they would look at it and see if the could. After some time the mechanic returned to get the Service Writer and they exited and soon she returned to let me know that what was wrong was both front wheel bearings were bad  and my idler arm and bracket were worn out. I asked how much to fix ans was quoted $446.00. I asked was u-joint bad ?"no it OK " I was told. I asked to see my vehicle and when I spun the wheels I herd no noise, when I checked for play by lifting up on tire I noticed none. Then moving tire side to side I felt no play in the Idler arm. Now mind you anything can break at ant time, but I had my vehicle in the shop last week for a tie rod end and front end alignment by men I have trusted for years. So I refused the repairs and for my vehicle to be taken off the lift. The mechanic then came over to where we were, I then asked him "you didn't find anything wrong with the u-joint? NO was his answer. As he backed the vehicle off the lift a loud ping could be heard, like that you here when you have a bad u-joint. I then drove to another shop recommended by my son-in-law, and when their mechanic walked under the vehicle he could see the u-joint was bad with out touching it.
U-joint was repaired and $70.00 later I was on the road with no vibration.    So before I let A-1 Tire do any work on my vehicle I would recommend you take it to a honest shop to determine what is really wrong.

name: Aubrey Wilson
text:
As a small business owner, I'm loathe to leave a bad review because running a business is difficult enough without trying to overcome a unjustified complaint.

I chose McMahan's because of the numerous positive reviews I saw online. I think now that I was misled.

I had three issues with my truck; fuel pump, flashing brake lights and nonworking A/C. I  wanted the mobile service, but the A/C problem required a shop visit.
They called me back in 2 days with written details of work performed at just about $800-including the veteran discount.

Shortly after leaving the shop, the A/C began to fail. The next day the brake light was on again.  I voiced my disappointment and was told that I should make an appointment to have them correct it. I admit to being taken aback at the requisite appointment making, but I had already paid for three items with only one completed.

On the next appointment, I was called to say that while they were testing my A/C, my radiator began to leak. Please note that there had been no issues prior-none, not overheating or leaks of any kind. I was sent a very bad photo of a radiator and a quote of $412 to replace it. I agree assuming that was the extent of the issues. 3 hours later they called to say that I had a compressor issue and the fix was $1,300. Had they told me that originally, I would have cut my losses and gone somewhere else, but it appears that there was a need to justify the effort with some work of some kind.

I refused the A/C repair and when I arrived to pickup the truck, they made an overt attempt to make sure that they showed me a defective radiator that I had no interest in seeing. I instead wanted to the radiator installation. Even though they remarked that they chose clamps were original, they didn't replace them or the hoses.

2 days later, the brake light is back on again.  I haven't felt this screwed in a very long time. I paid for their time and failed efforts, but my time is lost forever. But you don't have to feel like me. Just  avoid this business altogether.

name: JOHN MANN
text:
I took my Jeep in for warning lights on the instruments. Michael went to my house with me to drop me off while he repaired the car. The anti-skid and ABS lights were on and Michael was pretty sure he knew the problem and the diagnostic proved him right. He completed the fix before Noon and dropped the Jeep off at my house!
Michael is dedicated to his job and loves what he does, as well as being very proud of his reputation for excellence, so he does his very best on every job he takes.  He is a consummate pro (and a little OCD) so his shop is always super-clean) and you can see his attention to detail in the way his tools are well-organized and kept in immaculate condition. He call's himself the Lunatic Mechanic, probably because he takes on jobs that other small shops wouldn't attempt.
There are only a few places in Huntsville that I trust for automotive repairs, and McMahan's is one of the top two. I trust him completely. I highly recommend McMahan's for your auto repair needs.

Shout out to Hoffren’s Auto Diagnostics in Fairhope!!!
They are an honest & hardworking group! They didn’t oversell- ever. Always recommend exactly what is needed. Always fix amazingly well at fair prices. They are accredited & the work legally stands up to any potential vehicle recall issues.

I’ve had 2 vehicles worked on by them (in one instance, was dealing with the dealership as well & able to compare suggested repairs/quotes.)

Example:
The dealership told me rotors needed to be replaced & all motor mounts. Quoted me around $1,500 and couldn’t tell me exactly.
Hoffrens (not knowing what dealership said) told me rotors needed to be turned & 1 motor mount needed to be replaced, plus took the time to explain without me asking. Including oil change & cleaning throttle body, as well- the entire quote was less than half the dealerships unsure quote.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! We strive to make you happy with our service!

name: Larry Wise
text: Good services, fair prices

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review!

name: Cheryl Potter
text: Fantastic

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review!

name: Alicia Allen
text: Great work

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review!

name: BK Sensei
text: Went there March 16, 2021 just a few hours before the tornado that hit the area close by. These guys went above and beyond that day. That took care of my vehicle and the others in the shop even close to the time of the tornado passing. They made sure everyone there was safe and took us to the safest center room they had. I have a strong and hardy work ethic and even I wouldn't have asked these guys to work in the garage at the time they did. I have nothing but good regards for each and every person working there that day. I can't complement them enough. Definitely deserved a sixth star that day. Make sure you keep this place in mind when you need something taken care of.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so grateful for your kind words and for your support. Thank you for choosing us!

name: Kevin Jones
text:
Greystone Tire and Automotive recently performed my son's 120k Service for a 2014 Camry SE. The car performs better than it did when we purchased the car with 70k miles on the odometer. The car "now" idles quietly which is uncommon for most four cylinder engines in my opinion.
The car drives like it's new. The difference after the 100k service and tune-up is appreciable.

resp.text: Kevin, thank you for your review! We were glad to help your son out with his 120k service on his 2014 Camry SE. We look forward to seeing you family next time!

name: Chad Cullum
text: Always a great experience, especially when dealing with Brooks. I've had five cars in there over the past two years, and I've never been disappointed with the service.

resp.text: Chad, thank you for your review! We're glad to help you out with your automotive repair needs and we'll see you next time!

name: Sheri Davis
text: Great place -- reasonable prices good staff

resp.text: Sheri, thank you for your review! We're glad to provide quality auto repair service while being friendly and reasonable. See you next time!

name: Ashley Smith
text: I was over on 280 for a massage when I noticed my van picked up a nail on the right passenger side. Thankful for these guys who took me right away to patch my tire so I could drive back over to my side of town in Trussville. If it wasn’t for them I probably would be stranded on the side of the road desperately seeking away to pick up my three small kids.  Thank you for being so kind, fast, and for having much compassion!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Ashley! We take pride in providing automotive solutions for our customers in an efficient and friendly manner and we're glad we could help with your van's tire. We appreciate your kind words and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: AMBER TOLBERT
text: I had an incredible experience here with way better pricing than I have had on previous work on my car. Great service. Quick. Great price. Locally owned. You really can’t beat it!

resp.text: Thank you for the fantastic review, Amber! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and that we were able to provide quality auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: KATHY RILEY
text: Slight issue with the first battery they put in, but it was a FAST easy swap. As a working mom...nothing beats how speedy and friendly these folks are!

resp.text: Kathy, thank you for leaving us a review and for continuing to trust us with your automotive repair and maintenance needs. We are glad to have you as a customer!

name: Phil Duke
text: Brooks ordered and installed new tires same day I called to ask.  Did the work in less time than he had estimated.  Very satisfied

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Phil! We take pride in providing quality and efficient auto services and we're glad we could order and install new tires for your vehicle. We appreciate your kind words and hope to see you back!

name: Sam Ferlisi
text: Diagnosed the issue, got the parts and made the repairs same day.  Radiator had to be replaced so the quick turn around was very beneficial.

resp.text: Sam, thank you for your review. We're glad we could diagnose your issue and got the repairs done in a timely manner. We will see you back in our auto repair shop soon!

name: Alex Larry
text: I’ve been coming here for years. Best prices. Best people to work with will take good care of you. Super fast. Trustworthy. Would highly recommend coming here first for any car needs

resp.text: We're so grateful for your support as well as your loyalty over the years to our shop in Birmingham, Alex! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kimberley Phillips
text: The power steering went out on my car.  They ordered a hose and it came in later than expected; however, these guys went above and beyond to have my car ready when they promised.  When and if I ever need work done on my car, these guys are the ones I'm using.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Kimberley! We're glad that we were able to take care of your vehicle's power steering and earn your trust in our shop. We appreciate your kind words and we're looking forward to having you back!

text: Excellent service.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and for supporting our auto repair shop!

name: Pierce Brunner
text: Needed new tires on a tight schedule. They had it turned around in less then a day. They have a great a staff and great prices.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Pierce! We're glad that we could help you out with a new set of tires at great prices. We appreciate your kind words and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

text: Good work and good price. Just not crazy about sitting in your waiting room so long - without any magazines geared for women. :-)

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Judy! We're glad that we were able to deliver quality auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your feedback and will work on getting new magazines. Let us know if there's any other auto services that we can do for you!

name: Jared King
text: Had a great experience with the staff. Called in AM and they told me to come by around 2pm for an alignment. They were able to have my taken care of in about 25 minutes. One of two shops in town that I would go to if I had any mechanical issues.

resp.text: Thanks, Jared! Your experience means everything to us. We're glad you chose us to do your alignment and we appreciate your loyalty! We look forward to seeing you again in the future!

name: Cathy McNeil
text: Very efficient as well as professional. Staff that knew what they were doing without taking advantage of you. Great place!!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review, Cathy! We take pride in our staff and their ability to take care of customers and vehicles. We appreciate the five-star rating and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Kristeena Thomas
text: We started using them for our company vehicles' routine maintenance. Easy to deal with, reasonable prices, and they actually do company accounts that way we don't have to call them with a company card every time we need service. HIGHLY recommend using them!

resp.text: Thanks, Kristeena! We appreciate your business and are always happy to service your company's vehicles. We appreciate the kind words! See you next time!

name: Kyle Bandy
text: Really great experience here! Brooks was very professional and the work done was very timely! Will be a returning customer

name: Dennis Wilson
text: Good service, competitively priced, friendly staff. I have been using Greystone Tire & Auto for several years and have always had a good experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Dennis! We're glad that we've been able to deliver consistent auto services at fair prices. We appreciate your continued support and we're looking forward to seeing you back!

name: Gabe Goodson
text: Great turn around time on the work I had done to my automobile, very professional and customer service is second to none. I will be using Greystone Tire & Auto from here on out.

text: Great family owned business always do a great job on my cars !

text: Awesome place , clean , excellent service . friends of ours , highly recommend .

text: Great experience!!! Pulled up as they were closing, after a rough day, and they still plugged my tire which was well on its way to going flat! Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, John! We're happy to help you out with your automotive repair needs and we'll see you next time!

name: Julie Mosby
text: Had a low pressure light come on.   Called them and they told me to come on over.   They checked the tire and found a nail, plugged it and I was on my way !!   Very professional and all done in about 15 minutes !!   Highly recommended !!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us an awesome rating and review, Julie! We understand that unexpected car troubles typically happen at really inconvenient times, which is why we strive for speed as well as efficiency. See you next time!

name: William Philpott
text: Great people, great service!  Thanks for helping our four car family keep rolling!

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, William! We're glad that we could help your family with their vehicles and we appreciate your continued support! Let us know if we can assist with any other auto services!

name: Billy Brown
text: Great service. Helpful, quick and fair. Will definitely continue taking my vehicles to them.

name: Westley Said
text: What I found most surprising was everyone hospitality. Great people and did not try to sell me something I did not need. They are fast and accurate at what they do and this is now my go to place. Definitely a thumbs up from me!

name: damonNzelda Patrick
text: They are very professional and have great prices on your car needs. Napa auto parts is connected to the store as well which is a plus.

name: tidefanz
text: Great service! They will tell you what repairs need to be done and which ones can wait. I will recommend G.A. To my friends.

name: Dave Bechtel
text: Great Job. Excellence is the norm for their work

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review, Dave! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and that we were able to deliver excellent services. We hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Dominik Herrmann
text:
Great place and knowledgeable, friendly staff offering services at a reasonable price. Especially with CostCo discount. Only complaint is when I went to get my A/C checked out they only told me what I already knew. It's stuck on defrost. Repairing it would require taking the dash out. Well that's an easy 500$.
However, they did not notice the ripped vacuum-tube that connects to the driving cabin, which could be fixed from the engine compartment. Had to fix it myself after I noticed the problem. Could have done a better job on that. Otherwise great job.

name: Dylan Minor
text: Honest automotive shop that will take care of you fast and easy.

resp.text: Dylan, we're very grateful that you chose our shop in Birmingham for your automotive needs and we're glad to hear you found the service exceptional and prompt; that's our goal each time! Please let us know if there's anything else we can do for you!

name: Edward Zwilling
text: Recommended by AAA when my car overheated.  Honest folks.  Certainly had the opportunity to take advantage of me.  They did not.  Just added coolant and replaced a leaky hose.  Good folks.  I will use them again.

name: Sandra Cross
text: I had to have my radiator and battery replaced in my car and it was ready over the weekend. Everyone is very kind and honest here- pricing was also very competitive compared to others that I received a quote from. These are some go-to people if you have any car troubles!!

resp.text: Sandra, thanks so much for reviewing us! We appreciate your kind words and are glad to hear that we are your go-to guys for car repairs! Have a wonderful day, and we look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Sarah Kirkland
text: Probably one of the worst customer service experiences I’ve ever had in my life. In short, I had to have it towed there TWICE because they never fixed the problem in the first place, my CAR WAS STOLEN because they left the keys in the car overnight, and then they jerked me around for months after and even refused to pay for getting a new key (that was stolen out of the car.) The owner seems nice, but the people at the front of the house constantly lied to me and my family. Awful, awful service.

name: Austin Howard
text: Had multiple services done on my truck including: lift install, tpms calibration, and alignment. All services done in a timely manner at very reasonable prices. Highly recommend and will be back!

name: Margaret M.
text: Tammy is always easy to work with and  the staff is all trustworthy and dependable when it comes to what maintenance my car really needs verses other chain locations that just want an extra penny.

resp.text: Margaret, thank you for the great rating and for recommending us! Integrity is so important to us and we're glad to see that your experience reflected that. See you next time!

name: Angie Trantham
text: We recently took our van to Greystone Tire and Auto and were very pleased. They did a great job and the prices were incredibly reasonable. We will be back!

resp.text: Angie, thanks so much for taking the time to leave us this review! It was our pleasure working with you and we are so glad to hear that you will be returning to us! Have a great week!

name: Ben Evans
text: Trustworthy group - family owned.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Ben! We take pride in earning the trust of our customers and we're proud to be family owned and operated. We hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Tory Bryant
text: I actually came to the Napa auto parts store next to auto masters for a headlight bulb and the guy wasn’t very helpful but he did suggest this place after I asked him are there any places nearby to help. It was a little after five and I wasn’t expecting them to help that night because they were so close to closing but they instantly sprang into action and fixed everything in less than 10 minutes! Super awesome helpful staff and will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Alex Tobon
text: I have used Greystone Tire and Auto multiple times. As usual the management and mechanics are always polite and helpful. They were prompt and the prices are always reasonable.  If you're looking for a great all around auto service, this is the place.

name: Joel Alakhras
text: Top Notch service and extra mile staff. I recommend the folks at Greystone Tire & Auto for your vehicles need. Very pleased!!!

resp.text: Joel, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this review! We will always go the extra mile for our customers because we could not run this business without you guys! We are looking forward to seeing you next time and appreciate your recommendations!

name: Murphy Klumpp
text: Have used these guys for years and have never once had an issue. Great people that truly care about you and making sure that your vehicle is properly taken care of. Great management and service, I highly recommend!

name: Biju Nair
text: Friendly staff and quick service. Great savings if you're a Costco membership through Costco Auto program!

name: andrew white
text: Prices are always good, they have some top notch guys working there.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words, Andrew! We take pride in our team and we're glad that we could deliver quality services at fair prices. Thanks again for reviewing us and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Alaa Abuafif
text: Good and fast service is of best places in Alabama

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Alaa! We appreciate you and your business. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Pierce Brunner
text: Family owned and run business, they always get things done on time and do quality work. I also like there online appointment tool, Its a lot of help when you have a busy schedual like myself.

name: Chris DeGreen
text: Brooks and the team was awesome!

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome rating and kind words, Chris! We're glad that you had a great experience at our shop and we hope to see you back for future auto services!

name: Deanna Helton
text: So I post many reviews and honestly I hate for them to be negative but I have had a horrible experience here. I went in on Tuesday 12/18 because my car was running hot. Tammy was nice enough to give me a ride home while I waited. Firstly my car was not correctly diagnosed I spent over 500$ here and still having the same issue. When I picked it up drove toward Wal-Mart it immediately got hot so the looked at it again right before closing then i leave again same thing finally I park in publix to let it cool down. Again in the morning I take it back. Again they check it send me on my way 30 minutes later car hot again. I call and was pretty much brushed off and was told that they fixed what they thought was the problem. So as of right now I've been charged all this money car still running hot n they acting like it's cool I came in with 1 problem which has still not to be resolved. I will I'm so disappointed I travel alot for work and I'm in Alabama all alone no family I came here expecting a1 service seeing that it's connected to a napa but to spend this type of money and my issue not be fixed I'm so disappointed. Now I have to go get my car worked on all over again so I can hopefully make it home for Christmas.

name: Randy Jaudon
text: Great Place, Quick, Clean  & Friendly.  Tammy was great.  I have a new place to service my vehicle.

name: trish velez
text: BEWARE....Don’t trust these guys. We needed a headlight changed on our Prius. We were told how much. When we returned to get the car they charged us an extra $15.00 because they said in was hard! My husband asked well why didn’t you call us first to make sure it was okay. They didn’t have an answer.

name: Rene Morrison
text: This is the only place I take our vehicles to.

resp.text: We appreciate the excellent rating, Rene! Customers like you make our job easier and we're glad to help with your vehicles. Let us know if there's any other auto services that we can do for you!

name: Tammey Elliott
text: Very friendly and knowledgable staff.I will not take my car anywhere else!!

name: Carolina Gillis
text: very attentive and professional. definitely will be my go to shop!

name: Johnathan Kings
text: Quick and friendly service with very fair prices!! thanks

resp.text: Johnathan, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us your feedback! Getting our customers back on the road in a timely manner is extremely important to us, and we are happy to hear you had a great experience. Have a happy Wednesday!

name: Wj Brown
text:
My daughter’s 07 Kia Sorento stopped on her on the freeway in Atlanta, she had it towed to a shop in Atlanta. They replaced the battery and alternator 500.00.  Two weeks later she is getting warning lights on the dashboard. Fearing that it might be more problems, when she came home for a wedding, I called Greystone Auto and took it in for a diagnostic. In less then 30 mins, results were in; defective alternator(new) . The folks at Greystone called the Atlanta shop and coordinated an under warranty replacement. That was a blessing not to have to worry about my daughter having a malfunctioning car while living there alone.
I have always gotten good service and fair prices here. I have had at least 5 repairs done there and never a complaint.
Thanks Brooke and all the folks there for easing our anxieties.! Now I have another review to write about that Atlanta shop 😡!

name: Marnie Cowan
text: We recently took a car here to get a pre-purchase inspection done, and had a great experience as they were professional, efficient and knowledge and offered a reasonable price.

name: Karen Estes
text:
Women: do not go there! Send a man!  I had trouble getting someone at the desk. I need a new light for my brakes (just one). They wanted $40.00 and I have the bulb !  No respect !!
As a woman I am used to being taken advantage of!!!!!!’

resp.text: Hello, Karen. Unfortunately we were slammed this morning so we apologize if we were not able to get to you sooner at the counter. We were not able to install this for you because you bought the part through Autozone and for legal reasons we must install our own parts in the shop. We would never discriminate or take advantage of anyone based on their gender, the reason we could not help you is simply because the part was not purchased through us. If you'd like to discuss this further, feel free to call us at the shop. Thank you.

name: Ben Pickett
text: Incredible service with great prices, these guys will really bend over backwards to make sure you're happy.

name: Bruce Weaver
text: Quick response to my needed repair.

resp.text: Thanks so much for letting us know how we did, Bruce! Getting our customers back on the road in a timely manner is very important to us, and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience here. Have a terrific week!

name: Nelson Henderson
text: I have been in Automotive field for 35 years and this Place will become my Automotive Service Center because I felt as if they were honest and staff was very friendly. Tammy and Dustin were very Professional.

resp.text: Nelson Thanks for trusting us with your vehicle. Thanks for the review it is always great to here how our family is treating you.

name: Phil Clements
text: Fast, professional service

resp.text: We're glad you think so, Phil. That's our goal! We appreciate you sharing the word about us!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words, Jacob! We appreciate your business and hope you have a wonderful day!

name: ye li
text: Great job in fixing my car irregular noise !!!

name: Joe Earnest
text: Great service in every aspect.

name: Adrian Little
text: They were amazing. I greatly want to thank Charles and my guy DeAndre for taking care of me. Great place of business and people!

name: Walter Henderson
text: Great place for a good deal with Brandon Howard.

name: Jerrell Burns
text: Awesome service! If you need a vehicle, do yourself a favor, go see them. Ask for Deandre

name: Ronnie Johnson
text: Longest wait for maintenance ever... 4 plus hours with an appointment.

name: Zackary Pettway
text: The service department is terrible. They take a week or more just to diagnose your vehicle issue. The service department never answers the phone. Who has the time to leave the car for extended indefinite amount of time.

name: Doug Lunsford
text: Thought I needed a tire after I had badly scuffed one (including a small piece out of the rubber). The service guy checked it out thoroughly with me and discussed options, including not buying a tire until later. I really appreciated that they didn't just sell me a tire (since he knew I thought I'd have to have one) but talked me through the pros and cons of the choices. So I'm waiting a while, unless I have to go on a trip, but you can bet I'll buy it here.

resp.text: Doug Lunsford, we are glad we could help! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Kawana Jones
text: Sales associate was really rude. He judge my pockets by my looks. I was looking for a cash car. The car he showed me look nothing like the one on their website. Every other sentence was this is a cash car. He kept saying cash cars don't last long and I had to realize it was a cash car. His rudeness didn't allow me to think of purchasing a cash car nor a financed car. I could have done either but not with them.

name: Qt
text: Looking for a newer vehicle very nice just wish i could have done business with them.

resp.text: Qt, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at Capitol Chevrolet Montgomery Service Department!

name: Sarge W. Ruffin
text: I came in this morning (Saturday) without an appointment at 8:15am. I was in and out in about 90 minutes. All the free TV and coffee I could take. Clean area and courteous staff. Very good experience.

resp.text: Hi Sarge W. Ruffin, thank you so much for your positive comments about Capitol Chevrolet Montgomery Service Department! We hope you have a great day!

name: Doris Polard
text: After being transferred about 4 times I still weren't able to ask about my vehicle that's been in the shop for 5 days.Not satisfied 😌

name: Danita R.
text: Thank you Mr. Danny Head and Savanna for your Excellent Customer Service on yesterday. You made my service check up easy. I'll be back because of your friendliness,  professionalism and most of all making me feel important/special. See you in a couple months.....🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Customer Service

resp.text: Hi Danita R., thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Capitol Chevrolet Montgomery Service Department. We're happy we could meet your expectations! We sincerely thank you for the positive review, and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Adam Mattes
text: Went to get a misfire diagnosed and no suprise they diagnosed me with a misfire but wouldn't tell me anything past that. Instead they wanted $1200 to replace my spark plugs (they had just been replaced), spark plug wires, and clean my throttle body. A quick look at the throttle body would have told them it was clean. A quick look at the spark plugs would have told you they were correct and attaching a multimeter to the wires can tell you if they pass. They did not check my fuel pressure (takes 2 seconds with the proper tool) or my fuel injectors and did not check the camshaft position sensor which I think (again I didnt get it diagnosed) is wrong. They will say I refused further diagnosis when I refused replacement of everything but what I really refused is their poor excuse of what I diagnosed is. My though is take your money and run I can learn what they told me just sitting in my driveway.

name: Phillip Dunn
text: Oil change was 69.00 yesterday I was told by service adviser, today I paided 83.00 plus. Price change over night. Damm!

name: Kendra Washington
text: Got the car I wanted

name: Mark Brogdon
text: I live in Florida and found a Jeep Wrangler they had there online. Before I left, I called to make sure it was still there. Mr. Ricky Jones said "let me call you right back, I'm going to walk out there and put my eyes on it before I tell you to drive 3 hours up here." He called back within 10 minutes and told me he had pulled it off the lot and to come on. That started how great the service and experience was there. Everyone was super friendly and personable. I didn't feel like I was being hustled or pressured into buying anything. Even though they aren't a Jeep dealership, they knew the answers to my questions regarding the jeep. I ended up buying it and couldn't have had a better experience, all the way from Mr Ricky in sales to AJ in finance office. Super easy buying experience!

name: Leon Howard
text: Several employees didn't have a mask on. I didn't get the answers for replacing my tires. I was disappointed with service.

resp.text: Leon Howard, it's upsetting to hear that you did not receive the top-notch service we strive to provide. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (866) 845-7565. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Tamika Jones
text: Best salesmen everything went by smooth and my parents were approved

resp.text: Tamika Jones, thank you so much for your high rating! We hope you have a great day!

name: Jakobe/Cameron Garrison
text: Very professional and quick ser6was done within 1 hour..

name: Antoinette McCray
text: They are very hospitable work very hard to help you out and I know their stuff thanks mr. Harris and AJ

name: Brandon Owens
text: Quick and painless transaction when I went to pick up my tire

name: Eric Jones
text: Amazing service

name: Edward Vance
text: I have been going to this service department since 2009. Every time I go in I am usually helped by Mr. Brian or Mr. Danny and they are always very friendly and helpful. I have never had a bad experience.

name: Andre Hodges

resp.text: Andre Hodges, thank you so much for your high rating! We hope you have a great day!

text: Quick and really good coffee machine

resp.text: Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we did. We hope you have a great day!

name: timaka redmon
text: I was very pleased with the quickness of my service. I was prepared to spend at least an hour for service, but I was very long enough to enjoy the free cup of joe.

name: Rowan Thorn
text:
Cap Chevrolet has gone down hill when they were bought out. Gone are the perks of being a hometown dealership.

If you are wise, take your business to Larry Puckett in Prattville. They run circles around Cap Chevrolet.

name: Ricarda Parrish
text: The service consultants that I work with (Sam & Danny) really do care... The technicians leave a lot to be desired to be fixed...

name: Christine Riello
text: I've had my Suburban for almost 15 years from a previous state. Used to get serviced here but stopped because they are super expensive and charged me $100 to tell me my truck needed to be replaced when all it needed was a water pump. Never refunded me the fee for looking at my car even though I was promised it would be refunded. Not reputable in my opinion. Just trying to get me to buy a new vehicle. Go to McGriff's. Honest, fair, and affordable.

name: hyunjoon&miki song
text: They know how to treat the customer ^^

name: Tara Smith
text: LOVE THEM AND THEIR POPCORN MACHINE WITH BEVERAGE AND SNACK SECTION

name: Samuel Malone
text: I drove from Mississippi to Montgomery Alabama to purchase a pre owned hyundai elantra from Capitol Chevrolet of Montgomery. It was priced $4000 below retail.  I worked specifically with Quenita Mitchell, and S M Harris, who went out of their way to make sure I received the best deal possible. The facilities are very nice, and the staff is extremely friendly knowledgeable and helpful.

name: Giuliana Marie Marinucci
text: I went in to look at the 2018 Traverse on 9/16/2017. When I arrived, I was looking at the vehicle from the outside in before being approached by a salesperson. When the lady finally came up to assist me, I asked if I could look inside of the vehicle - if she had the keys - because the truck was locked. She told me "no" but she could take me inside and give me the specs for the vehicle from the tablet. Ok, fine... thats good for the moment. We get in and she starts running numbers on what the payment would be and telling me what the truck had it in based on what was on her tablet... disregarding the fact I asked her multiple times to go outside and get it unlocked so that I could get inside of it and look. I know what I can afford, I already did the numbers before I got here. All I wanted to do was look at it and see if it fit my family's needs. She finally unlocked it but when I started touching the touch screen she yelled at me like I was a kid even though there was little damage I could do to the vehicle (not that it was my intentions but) since the vehicle was in demo mode. I was also not allowed to sit in the drivers seat. She had told me multiple times that the truck was out of my price range, knowing NOTHING about my finances because I had not yet disclosed that information in any form. Then she had the "manager" come out and he told me the same thing, that I couldnt afford this vehicle but they could put me in a cheaper vehicle. Long story short, they lost a purchase from a client who makes over $100k per year because "I couldnt afford that vehicle". We will take out business on to Prattville to the Chevy dealer up here when they get the 2018 Traverse in stock.

text: I am so happy I found this place. I purchased a Hammerhead 250ss go cart second hand and when I purchased it, it would turn over but not start. The owner said the he let the go cart sit up for a year, but it did run but was pretty sure the carburetor needed cleaning. I took it to Basch Brothers in Cullman, because this is where the cart was originally purchased. I told them that I wanted to get the carburetor cleaned  and to look over the go cart for anything else it needed. They called me the next day and said it had no compression. I told them that's odd because when I purchased the cart, I checked the compression and it was at 90lbs. They said I don't know what to tell you but we are only get 60lbs. AT this point I understood they didn't want to work on it and I picked it up and took it to Dr. Joe's in Ensley. They found the carburetor was gumed up and the vacuum line. They return the go cart to me  the next day completely fixed. The fee was only $115 and the work was completed quicker than I expected.

name: vincenzo ceccarelli
text:
High quality work, fair prices, and excellent service. My wife and I are new to town and found Superior Auto Care on Google. I have two separate experiences to share.

1. After completing our move from Washington state, Philip got us right in to look at the brakes on my wife’s Subaru and do an oil change.  He had his techs do a thorough inspection only to find that the brakes were good and just a little squeaky. The labor cost was marginal and totally worth it for the peace of mind. The oil change was also very reasonably priced.
2. Brought the Subaru back in to have the AC serviced. Once again everything was working as it should be so Philip threw me the keys and sent me on my way free of charge.

Honesty and integrity go a long way with me. Philip has both of those qualities and will have my business for as long as his shop is open. If you’re on the fence about where to take your ride, Philip at Superior Auto Care is your guy.

name: John Whitaker
text: A/C not cooling as it should. A national oil change chain business told me the A/C compressor had to be replaced, approximately $800, or           $ 1400 with a warranty. I searched here and found Superior Auto Care. Problem resolved (replaced low Freon). I couldn't be more pleased with their honest and friendly service. They have all my auto repair business from now on. I'm not saying the national business tried to rip me off, they may have just been incompetent.

name: Bill Stratman
text: The mechanic is fantastic. They replaced my engine and did it right the first time. No loose bolts or missing parts. Everything was done right. Very thorough.

name: Gideon Rah
text: Deserves five stars. Friendly help. Goes above and beyond.

name: Haley Wood
text:
Truly top notch service and has my business forward. Now let me tell a story.....

My wife’s car was giving vibrations by my own accord and felt by the look of things, balancing would fix the issue. She was due new tires but I had a month or so before committing to new set. The tires had whooped out on the back two, but good tread even in the low spot and could not be balanced.  Still safe just rough riding by my account. Ordered tires, set up an appointment with a different tire shop on Saturday,  loaded up the new tires in her car. Saturday appointment was not booked (I can’t get it done) so I figure I would set up an appointment with another local shop close to work for Tuesday.

Monday...

My wife calls me at 9 am with a blowed out tire. She already late. And she already told me them tires got to be changed before today.

(Disclaimer.:  Her car came with no spare and I had been inactively looking for one).

So I’m deep in the dog house if you didn’t read between the lines.

She gets a tow to Superior Auto Care and they get after it in due time. Not unreasonable for a spur of the moment and professionally put those new tires on I already had in the truck.(I double checked and correct torque and the exact psi to spec and not “normal” like most shops I have dealt with)

The question I had all morning..... was it my misjudgment and my wife is mad forever or was it a nail that even new tires could not prevent?

By all evidence from Superior Auto Care, it was a screw.  True detectives they are and me and my wife had a great week.

It was just a flat not a blow out by the pictures. she had. Her safety even by my own misjudgment would not have been compromised. But I’m glad it was a screws fault and not my misjudgment.

Great guys over there. Phillip was more than helpful. Couldn’t ask for better service in this situation by my wife’s accord.

She got to work late, held it over my head while I didn’t know if it was my fault. I committed to a lot of things I would do this week I had been putting off not knowing it was not my fault.  But, I’m sitting here a happy man. Walked the dog while having conversations with my wife. Deep stuff that could have went the other direction. That is if it hadn’t been for the folks at Superior Auto Care making the correct diagnosis for the problem.

They didn't try to upsell me but since i had been told at my oil change that the time was coming soon they verified and replaced it while there.

name: Elizabeth Tanner
text: I dropped my car off overnight and left the note stating I needed an oil change and wanted them to look at brakes. They called the next morning saying they changed my brakes and when they tried to even out the rotors they weren't able to do it. They never even called to tell me I needed new brakes first so I was forced into this service and their prices. I wasn't thrilled by the lack of communication but honestly I needed brakes so it didn't matter. I told him I'd be there before they closed and asked him to call me if for some reason it wasn't ready and he said okay. I show up before they closed and he looked at me like I had 3 heads and said my car wouldn't be ready until the next day and that they were very busy and i should have called and checked (...which I did when he called about the brakes). I'm new to the area and didn't know anyone so I had been walking to/from there in 100 degree weather. The lack of communication was very frustrating. The man did apologize and even offered to drive me home (which is why they get 2 stars) but I would not recommend this place for their lack of communication.

resp.text: Sorry for the miscommunication.  We hope to do better.   For those reading this - please call us before coming as things do happen that push completion dates/times out.  We can only try and we are here for our customers to help not hurt.

The mechanic is incompetent and the owner is dishonest.

Please contact us as soon as possible to discuss where we can improve and the issues you bring up, where we might improve or resolve to your liking. text: I had gone to Pep Boys to get my headlight repaired. After keeping my car for 3 days trying to "diagnose" an electrical problem, Pep Boys informed me that I needed my entire headlight assembly replaced and it would take a week to get the part in and cost $2,700.00. I declined and took my car to Downtown Car Care for a 2nd opinion. After an hour or so, DCC determined that all I needed was a FUSE replaced and a new bulb. DCC saved me $2,500+ and they'll be my first "go-to" place for future repairs. They are extremely professional and friendly and I was very impressed with how clean their shop is. I highly recommend!

name: Michael Scott
text:
My girlfriend and I recently came into some critical car troubles while we were moving to New Orleans. We stopped in the nearest town which was Mobile. We took our van to Downtown Car Care and they helped us out big time. We were looking at a 1000+ service request to change and fix our transfer case. We didn't have that kind of time or money to stay there and wait for that to happen. It is a 94' so they would have had to track down the part first. Time is money. The dudes at the shop found a temporary way to get our van running safely without even changing it. Ran and still runs like a beaut. Only charged us $20 for the whole thing. Easily could have taken our asses for a ride. Solid people working at this place and would recommend them to anyone if i lived in Mobile.

Thanks for all your help.

resp.text: I’m so glad to hear you had such a positive experience! Thank you!

name: Only Hazardous (Ryan Nichols)
text: My name is Ryan, and I’ve dealt with Harold personally on MANY accounts and I have never once been dissatisfied. Super friendly guy, honest, and he’ll get the job done quick. 10 out of 10 will do business again!

resp.text: So happy to hear you have always been satisfied with our services. We really appreciate the review you have left us!

name: Unicorn Sparkle with Anne Michael
text: I had a flat tire the other day while I was downtown. The people at Downtown Car Care really took exceptional care of me! They were so friendly and welcoming when I pulled in. They knew I needed my car fixed quickly since it was almost time for carpool that afternoon.  They were quick with patching my tire, and got me back on the road in no time! I will definitely be going back to see Harold at Downtown Car Care!

resp.text: We love hearing from satisfied customers! It makes all the hard work worth it. Thank you!
